name: □CHELSEA Room□ Close to  MAPFRE/ OSU/DOWNTOWN
description:
This cozy room is located on the SECOND floor of this duplex. Our stunning duplex has a total of 4 bedrooms and 2 baths. Incredibly close to MAPFRE stadium, Schottenstein Center, OSU, Convention Center, Downton Columbus, and so much more. Just north of us is beautiful Clintonville and Whetstone Park of Roses. Just south is vibrant OSU and Short North. Make this place your home away from home!

The space
The CHELSEA room is located on the SECOND floor of the unit. Our unit has a total of 4 bedrooms and 2 baths.

First Floor: CAROLINE Room + 1 bath
Second Floor: CHELSEA, CINDY, and CRYSTAL Room + 1 bath

Each bedroom has its own lock for convenience and privacy. The common areas, such as the living room, kitchen, and bathrooms are shared with other guests.

Our beautiful kitchen is well-equipped with cooking and dining utensils for a comfortable stay. The Laundry Room is downstairs, in the basement with laundry detergent provided
neighborhood_overview: Make sure to visit Used Kids Records for an amazing selection and the coolest staff around. Fox in the Snow Cafe is located in Italian Village and boasts fantastic cinnamon rolls. If you're a coffee lover, One Line Coffee and Mission Coffee are one of our favorite spots. Head north for some Hot Chicken Takeover in Clintonville if you dare! And for those cooking in, we are nearby Kroger, Giant Eagle, and Lucky's Market for your everyday grocery needs.

name: Close to OSU - Clintonville Homestay
description:
The room is on the 3rd floor of a three story house. There is a full kitchen and bath on the 2nd floor as well as a common area. There is a private entry in back but you can also you the front or side doors. Washer and dryer are in the basement. We are a 5 minute walk from a bus stop on High Street. This bus is regular (#2) and goes to Ohio State. The ride is 10-15 minutes. The house is very close to the Olentangy bike path. Ohio State University is about a 15 minute bike ride. 日本語 ok!

The space
We have a lot of experience with college students staying with us. Our students have come from Japan, China, Indonesia, Libya, Saudi Arabia, Brazil, Kuwait and the U.S. We speak Japanese and English in the house. Notes: we do have a cat that lives with us and no overnight house guests allowed.

Guest access
Access is available to all areas other than other person's bedrooms.

Other things to note
$300 deposit and first month re
neighborhood_overview: We are about 1 mile north of Ohio State University. We live in Clintonville area of Columbus. Grocery stores, restaurants, gym, yoga studios, coffee shops are all within a 15 minute walk from the house.
host_about: My wife and I are explorers (see the book Why Him, Why Her by Helen Fischer) and love to travel. We are not "stay in hotel, go to resorts" type of people. We love to meet others and get to know the countries we go to as much as possible. We hike, back pack, camp, try different foods, travel to different countries and so much more. We both speak Japanese and English. Akiko does speak some French. We have both been to over 35 different countries. What we like most is to take our children so they can gain new experiences and insights.

name: Housepitality ~ The Lilley Pad (Near Downtown!)
description:
Welcome to The Lilley Pad - Columbus. This bright, clean, oasis is a wonderful place to stay on your visit to Columbus. Located just 10 min east of downtown Columbus, this beautifully renovated house is the perfect spot for your family or group to stay. 3 Bedrooms, and 1.5 bathrooms are perfectly designed for your comfort. The open kitchen/dinning room and living space is the perfect space for a family meal, or gathering together.

The space
Our house The Lilley Pad is a 3 Bedroom 2 Bathroom home that has been completely renovated to be the perfect place to stay for your family or group while in Columbus. Our open kitchen and living space is the perfect spot for catching up while preparing a delicious group dinner. The living room is a good spot to relax to Netflix after a long day. The upstairs has 3 bedrooms, 2 large and one small. Enjoy a beautiful shower/tub and bathroom on the 2nd level. Our fenced in back yard is the perfect spot for Spot to run!
neighborhood_overview: Our neighborhood is one that is in transition. Several properties around our house have been neglected for years, and many have been torn down. Many are now being re-built. We love being part of the improvement happening to a neglected property, and we enjoy our neighbors in the South of Main neighborhood. If you, or a guest member is one that does not feel comfortable in a neighborhood that has some run-down buildings, but is full of smiling faces, then consider booking a different house for your trip.

name: Sweet Home in QUIET area near Airport, CU & DWTN
description:
We love our first home! Quiet residential neighborhood right outside Bexley with pleasant neighbors who want to keep the neighborhood safe and quiet!

Perfect location for someone coming to Columbus. Near airport (10 min drive) and less than 15 min from downtown. Limited street parking.

The space
Two bedrooms and full bath up with one bedroom and full bath in the basement. Living area, kitchen and dining area on main level.

Other things to note
House Rules
- Please make sure that the number of people listed on the booking is the same as the people who are staying; even if someone is staying for only part of your stay, they must be included in the number of guests. Since we have exterior security cameras, we are able to see who arrives.
-For liability considerations, no visitors allowed at property unless they are a registered guest
- Our home is not intended to be used for get-togethers or parties. Glitter and con
neighborhood_overview: Bexley is a really special place. Main Street has a number of interesting shops and a TON of eateries. Catch an independent film at the Drexel Theater and stop into Graeter's, Ohio's world-class ice cream shop, a stone's throw away (Bexley also has Johnson's :) ). There are always events at the Capital University front lawn - see if there is anything happening while you are in town!

name: Short North Luxury, sanitized stays
description:
The perfect landing spot in the heart of Columbus' Short North. An upscale space with comfortable furniture, king size bed, Wi-Fi, 65” smart TV, fully stocked kitchen & bath.
Within a half mile WALK you can find restaurants, breweries, shopping, coffee, and more. Entertainment, the Columbus Convention Center, The Ohio State University, and the Blue Jackets' Hockey Arena are less than 10 minutes away by car!
Come and enjoy the condo’s luxuries and all that Columbus has to offer!

The space
The entire condo is yours!! Beautiful hardwood floors throughout. The bedroom has a huge closet, natural light, a pillow top king mattress, fresh and clean linens, plenty of blankets, and a dresser. The kitchen is fully functional it just requires groceries. You'll find an oven/stove top, refrigerator, dishwasher, microwave, a stocked coffee station, basic spices/oils, and holdover snacks! The bathroom is clean and bright and provides towels/wash cloths, sham
neighborhood_overview: Its the Short North Baby!!!  Right in the middle of all Columbus has to offer and in walking distance of coffee, restaurants, entertainment, and shopping!  At this time everything in The Short North is open.  Our local businesses have put extra cleaning procedures in place and have revamped their spaces to allow for social distancing.  If you have decided that you are not going into stores and buildings unless absolutely necessary The Short North has outdoor art, parks, and patio seating for you to enjoy!  There are even sidewalk kiosks where you can get your picture taken!!!
host_about: I spent most of my adult life working with children with special needs.  After becoming empty nesters,  I shifted my focus to our real estate portfolio which allowed me to flex my hospitality muscles and host an Air BnB!!!  In addition to loving all things hospitality I love singing and dogs!

name: Quaint Townhouse in Merion Village #2
description:
Comfortable living space in historic Merion Village, with 800 sqft it's the perfect get away for two. Within walking distance to several bars and Schiller Park. A 10-12 minute drive to Downtown, Brewery District, Arena District, Short North, and The Ohio State University. - 19 minute drive to the main airport - 13 minute drive to the Convention Center Located just around the corner from the bus stop. There is a Kroger and a CVS available for groceries.

The space
This is an older home dating back to the 1920s. Ceilings are tall, rooms are quaint, stairs are steep. Please respect the dated property, and enjoy it's character.

There is no garbage disposal in the kitchen sink, please dispose of food in trash.

New HVAC has been installed, temperature should be acceptable as set.

Plumbing is fragile given the age of the home. Please do not flush anything other than toilette paper.

Guest access
Guests can a
neighborhood_overview: Merion Village is just south of German Village, which is home to many bars and restaurants. Schiller Park is a nice visit, especially during the summer days when they show Shakespeare in the Park.
host_about:
I'm hosting on Airbnb because I no longer live in half of my duplex property, and I enjoy sharing it's charming space with visitors looking to be just outside of downtown Columbus.  I enjoy all kinds of art, music, dance and food.  Wine, shoes, and dessert are my weaknesses.  I love traveling of all kinds, short road trips or long vacations. I hope my guests enjoy the passion and warmth I've put into my century old property. Thanks for your inquiry!

Throughout my busy days, I enjoy taking a moment to breathe in the world, and no matter how stressful or challenging life can become, I always find time to admire how huge and beautiful life is around me, and my challenges don't seem as extreme anymore.

name: Housepitality ~ The Orange-Door- Clean!
description:
It's always sunny at The Sunshine House! Relax and unwind on your trip to Columbus, with a stay at the Orange Door apartment. This bright, 2 bedroom townhouse has 2 bedrooms (1 King, 1 Queen) with great memory foam mattresses, has lots of space to spread out. The entire house has recently been renovated, and is fresh from head to toe. The back contains parking for 2 cars, and a mostly fenced in yard. Located in the heard of Franklinton, it is a quick ride to Downtown Columbus.

The space
Step in to a clean updated space, with all the amenities of home. Living room with TV and seating. Dinning room for a meal, and a kitchen stocked and ready to cook.

Upstairs you will find 2 bedrooms one with a king, and one with a queen bed. Our brand new bathroom has a nice shower and tub combination. Your dog will love our fenced back yard. There are 2 parking spaces behind the fenced yard off of the alley.

License number
2019-2287
neighborhood_overview:
Our neighborhood Franklinton is situated just west of Downtown Columbus, and is full of historic homes. This neighborhood has experienced many phases through out it's existence, and is currently in a revitalization phase. There are lots of properties being renovated, and some that still remain boarded and empty. This area has experienced some crime in the past, but has improved in recent years.

Franklinton has experienced several great floods in the past, and has been somewhat neglected throughout the middle to late part of the 1900's. The Franklinton Floodwall, completed in 2004, is 7 miles long, cost $134 million. The wall's completion has released the area from being considered a floodplain, as well as releasing the previous building restrictions that often prevented development in the past. As a result, commercial and industrial activities are starting to grow in the Franklinton Area.

The City of Columbus is focusing on creating a new Short North style neigh
host_about: I continue to be excited about Airbnb and home-sharing every day! I enjoy hosting guests, I LOVE to travel, and I really love meeting new people. I am a real estate broker that owns my own business, and I feel that my calling in life is to making spaces for people to enjoy. 5 things I can't live without are live music, friends, exploring new places, bacon, my drum set!

description:
The Green Leaf House is a great place to stay on your trip to Columbus. Our location is less than 5 min drive to Short North, and Downtown, 10 min to OSU. Our historic home has been lovingly renovated and furnished to be a spacious and relaxing place to stay. Enjoy 2 large bedrooms, an open kitchen/dinning room, and a cozy living room.

The space
Our 2 bedroom house is well suited for :

- Guests looking to be close to Downtown Columbus and the Short North.
- Traveling for work or pleasure.
- Groups wanting to be close to the Greater Columbus Convention Center.
- Groups wanting to be close to The Ohio State University.

Who is the property not the best fit for?

• Large groups of 9 or more adults.
• Guests that can not climb stairs.
• Guests that want to play loud music, party at the property and/or socialize outside of the property after 11 pm.

neighborhood_overview:
Milo-Grogan is a historic neighborhood close to downtown Columbus. With many historic homes and buildings, this is a lot of new development coming in to this area.

We are a short walk to the Short North, and Italian Village area. Our location is central to the city, and can be downtown in 5 min, OSU in 10 min, and most any part of Columbus in 20 min.

Our house is very close the COTA bus stop on Cleveland Ave and 2nd Ave. This is a direct line from the Columbus Airport.
host_about: I continue to be excited about Airbnb and home-sharing every day! I enjoy hosting guests, I LOVE to travel, and I really love meeting new people. The dining room table is very large - 6 chairs w/ additional chairs provided. All bedrooms have brand new memory foam matt
neighborhood_overview: The home is located in Weinland Park off of N. 4th St. There is a mix of musicians, professors, students, and working professionals who live in the area. description:
Enjoy our two story, three bedroom home with close proximity to downtown Columbus! The home is located in the Southern Orchards Area, please note that although the home is nearby to all of the benefits in the German Village, it is located in a transitional neighborhood. The house is just a two minute drive from Nationwide Children's Hospital.

The space
A two-story home that is comfortable and spacious. Centralized, but tucked away, this place is ideal for any type of guest! Located just a few blocks away from Nationwide Children's Hospital. There are a variety of local restaurants such as Barcelona, The Crest, Skillet, Lindey's, The Sycamore, The Brown Bag Deli, Scambler Marie's, Panera, and Tim Horton's. Everything in the house is in like-new condition.

License number
2019-1940
neighborhood_overview: Please note that while we are a couple blocks from German Village and half a million dollar homes, this is an up-and-coming neighborhood. It is in the process of being revitalized, but that type of work takes years. Nationwide Children's Hospital has improved it tremendously in the time we have been here, but is still a little rough around the edges. There are neighbors that are holding out for higher property offers, leaving their buildings boarded in the meantime.

description:
This townhome style apartment is blocks from High Street and located in Italian Village, which is a part of the Short North. The Short North is one of Columbus' most visited areas. With great restaurants, bars, shopping, entertainment, and much more, it's a great destination for any guest visiting the city. The apartment has many features making it a comfortable stay, including: tall ceilings, hard surface flooring, open and spacious first floor, large bathroom with over-sized shower, etc.

The space

neighborhood_overview: Just a few blocks from High Street, there are too many good restaurants to name here!  You're welcome to message me for some good spots though!  Whether it's fine dining, casual, just drinks, breakfast, brunch, lunch, or dinner, you will find it around the apartment.  Sports teams around are the Buckeyes (hopefully you are aware - if it's fall, it won't take long to figure that one out), Blue Jackets (pro hockey), Columbus Crew (pro soccer), and Columbus Clippers (AAA Baseball).  Enjoy your trip!
host_about: I visit other places whenever possible!  If there's good food, genuine people, and some music, I'll have fun. name: Charming 3BR w/King Bed-Walkable OSU/Short North
description:
Perfect for families and groups! Our charming, cozy home is located in historic Victorian Village, central to the city and all the best events of Columbus.

You’ll love it because we are just steps away from Ohio State, the Horseshoe, Nationwide Arena, Express Live, the Short North, MAPFRE Stadium, and downtown, and our home has the historic charm of the late 1800s!

Enjoy our warm, charming home as you explore the best of Columbus. Read on to learn more…..

The space
Our 3 bedroom home is family/group friendly. Our house has the charm of a home built in 1870 but the modern touch of new renovations. The aesthetic is clean, cozy, and simple and you will find it the perfect place for you and your loved ones during your stay in Columbus!

As you arrive to town, you will be comforted by the security and convenience of our OFF-STREET PARKING in the 2-car garage. This is a huge perk as all streets in the Short North require metered pa
neighborhood_overview:
Our home is ideally located for any event the city offers. We are walking distance/<$5 Uber fare from:

+Ohio State University
+Ohio Stadium
+Nationwide Arena
+the Convention Center
+the Short North
+Express Live!
+Huntington Park
+Schottenstein Arena
+Newport Concert Hall
+The James
+Wexner Medical Center

Additionally, there are countless unique and entertaining bars and restaurants steps away in the Short North. There is a market a few doors down as well as neighborhood bar (known for its open mic night!). There is a Kroger grocery store less than 1/2 mile away.

We are easily accessible from I-70, I-71, 315 and 670.
host_about:
Hi and welcome to Columbus! Through Airbnb, I’ve had the pleasure of hosting people from all over the world looking to stay in a comfortable, clean, private space in the heart of the city!  Because of our location, I have welcomed people on OSU football weekends, for Blue Jackets games and music festivals, some visiting relatives, many Ohio State Buckeyes, med students, business travelers, couples on weekend getaways, those attending conferences at the convention center and others looking to relocate to Columbus.  

I love hosting through Airbnb and hope thoroughly enjoy your stay!

name: Sparkling 3BR/Remodeled/Walk to Campus+Short North
description:
Visit kids. Catch a game. Reunite with friends. Welcome to our roomy 3 bedroom house on a quiet, tree-lined street — just two blocks from the hustle and bustle of the Short North and a 10 walk to campus.

Recently remodeled kitchen w/new appliances and exposed brick. 3 large bedrooms come with crisp bedding and plenty of storage for your stay.

The whole house is smart with Nest, Roku, Sonos and Alexas for your comfort + entertainment. And use our huge yard w/parking for pregame BBQ and hang.

The space
We have a lot of records. So feel free to play them. Also, the side yard is unique for Columbus, so please use it. And we are a music house so play music on our Sonos (at a reasonable volume as to not disturb the neighbors) and wake up with the an Alexa alarm and Sirius XM. And feel free to program the Nest to your exact comfort.

Guest access
We have a washer and dryer downstairs. When you are down there, you will
neighborhood_overview: We are two blocks away from all the restaurants and shops and bars of the Short North.  Just close enough to stumble home but far enough to not get caught up in it.

Adam runs a record label so you will find a lot of records and guitars all over the house. 

River really likes plants, so you are free to water them.

name: The Music Box - Comfy, Clean and Centrally Located
description:
Welcome to The Music Box! This adorable mid-century modern upstairs flat is centrally located to all the sweet spots in Columbus and is a comfortable spot for a short weekend or a long-term stay.

Due to COVID-19, we are taking extra care while cleaning The Music Box. We are following the insights and guidelines of the Centers for Disease and Prevention (CDC) listed here: https://www.airbnb.com/resources/hosting-homes/a/cleaning-guidelines-for-preventing-the-spread-of-covid-19-163.

The space
This 2 bedroom, 1 bath, 800 sq ft upstairs flat features local Columbus music (we provide a record player and local records!) and local art on the walls. There is a master suite with a dreamy king bed, a second bedroom with comfy queen bed, a large, fully-stocked kitchen and 2 balconies (one private balcony facing the front yard and one facing the large, fenced-in backyard with gas grill and cute patio furniture). This flat comfortably sleeps 3-4, but will sleep u
neighborhood_overview:
The Old North is centrally located between OSU campus and Clintonville. Old North is a special place with an eclectic, funky vibe. We moved to this neighborhood after playing many shows at Rambling House and getting to know many of the local residents. We are thrilled to call this neighborhood home and we can't wait for you to explore some of the recommendations you will find in our guidebook.

This is not a pretentious neighborhood by any means and is currently in a revitalization phase. We have been here for 1.5 years and have experienced no crime or safety issues. Our neighborhood is filled with families, children, grad students, musicians and artists and all of our guests have enjoyed the convenience of the location of The Music Box, but if you are looking for a posh neighborhood with upscale shops and boutiques, this is probably not the right listing for you and we would be happy to point you in the right direction. :)
host_about:
I love traveling and meeting new people, so I am excited to finally become an AirBnb host myself so that I can tell my guests all the great things that Columbus has to offer including live music, food, beautiful parks, sports, kid-friendly entertainment and nightlife.

I live in the Old North which is a unique, charming neighborhood in the heart of the city and I look forward to hosting your next trip!

description:
A cozy studio apartment with 10 foot ceilings steps from High Street in the Short North. This is a great apartment for access to events at Ohio State, Express Live, Nationwide Arena, the Convention Center, or Goodale Park. When you come home, enjoy relaxing on the back porch. Inside work at a desk by the window, or relax on the couch or queen bed and watch TV.

The space
Newly upgraded kitchen includes a full sized refrigerator, gas range, microwave, dishwasher, coffee maker, and bar height four top table. The kitchen has the basics in terms of pots, pants, a wine opener, pizza cutter, ice cream scoop, and little things like that.

The TV has a Netflix account you're welcome to use.

Guest access

We are taking the COVID-19 outbreak seriously. We want to highlight some of our cleaning procedures.

We spray down frequently touched surfaces (door knobs, light switches, thermostats) with disinfect
neighborhood_overview:
Enjoy Northstar Cafe just around the corner for breakfast, brunch, lunch, or dinner. If you're into tacos, Condado is a fun spot. Mouton is a lovely choice for craft cocktails, and if caffeine is your need One Line Coffee shop is a great choice.

The Short North has it all - from great events in Goodale Park and at the Convention Center, to restaurants, bars, coffee shops, galleries, and local shops. This apartment puts you in the heart of the neighborhood.

host_about:
I dig psychology, gardening, cycling, being a gym rat, and cooking. I have volunteered at a kids camp every summer since 1999 that teaches critical thinking and a love for nature. 

I have lived in Columbus most of my life and I love it here and I love sharing it with other people.  I'm a licensed Ohio real estate sales person.

My career in the non-profit sector has let me travel all over the country. I love the Bay Area, NYC, Washington state, and the Rockies.

As always we are totally dog friendly and you can even request a dog bed so your furry friend can stay with you too!

description:
Welcome to the "House of M.U.S.I.C", our Themed BNB!

Upon entry, you walk directly into the House of BLUES, literally (Living Room). See what is NOW PLAYING at any time.

Through the corridor, our ROCK N ROLL Kitchen features Jimmy Hendrix, Beatles & many more artist!

BOB MARLEY brings you Reggae Vibes (Half Bathroom).

Up the stairs you will find CLASSICAL (King Bedroom - R) & POP (Queen/Twin Bedroom - L).

The Full bathroom, our tribute to PRINCE..."When Doves Cry".

The space
The uniqueness of this Themed-BNB is that it caters to all humans... Let's face it, who doesn't like Music?

name: Shellee's Place
description:
Stay in the absolute centre of the King Arts District when you book this freshly renovated, artsy&bright condominium. Enjoy a show at the charming LincolnTheatre, a 582-seat performing arts venue. Experience the local culture with a quick trip to the Long Street Bridge and Cultural Wall. Savor a morning coffee at the Lincoln Cafe or evening cocktail at the world renowned Canabar just minutes from your door. Visit the King Arts Complex, an urban delight and sight of many historic celebrations.

The space
You'll be in the centre of it all. Shellee’s Place was recently renovated with contemporary finishes and creative touches that you’ll find comfortable, tranquil and attractive. Since I appreciate the culinary, the kitchen is thoughtfully equipped. A king size comfy bed in the bedroom, an queen size sleeper with a luxury air mattress and 2 firm twin daybeds for ultimate nightly comfort.

Guest access
You will have access to the whole space,
neighborhood_overview: The Lincoln Theatre, The King Arts Complex, Canabar, The Lincoln Cafe, Barriste LaFleur Galleria, Creole Kitchen, Franklin Park Conservatory, Equitas Health King Lincoln Pharmacy, the Ole Towne East and all its restaurants, downtown, the Short North and the Greater Columbus Convention Center just minutes away! Short drive to Easton Shopping Center and 7 minutes from airport.
host_about: I am enjoying sharing my Airbnb with guests. I'm a hostess at heart and want to make sure my guest have everything. I'm a creative, working as a photographer and creating floral images that you'll see throughout my home. I look forward to you coming and visit soon!

name: The Short North Retreat III - Free Private Parking
description:
Enjoy everything the Short North and Columbus has to offer in this unique & cozy flat.

The 'Short North Retreat III' is located in the heart of the Short North, however, it is located on the back of the building so you are able to enjoy all the great activities without worrying about the noise!!!

You are treated to local art, unique comfortable decor as well as a dedicated parking spot (huge benefit given the area).

Whether for work or play, there is no better AirBnb in the Short North.

The space
The space offers plenty of space for 4 guests with a stylish comfortable couch ( West Elm queen sleeper sofa) + two cozy accent chairs, with curated decor from local Columbus shops, exposed brick walls, modern appliances + all the comforts you expect from a first class Airbnb including:

free private parking (1 space) coffee machine (Kuerig) + coffee pods, washer/dryer, cookware, linens, fast WiFi, 50" smart T.V.
neighborhood_overview: The Short North is the most vibrant neighborhood in Columbus, and this home is located in the heart of all the action. You are located right on high street which allows you to be seconds away from the best nightlife, restaurants and shopping that Columbus has to offer.

name: Cozy, Private Room Near Dwntwn & Children’s Hosp
description:
This room, in a shared space, is situated in an immaculate, snug, cozy home that is clean, updated and bright. It is in a central location and easily accessible to 70, 71, as well as 670. You can enjoy the nightlife of Short North and Downtown Columbus, as well enjoy a short commute to Children’s Hospital or OSU. This room has a smart tv, for your enjoyment, with the ability to mirror your Smartphone. Make yourself at home, away from home!

The space
This remodeled cape cod is minutes from downtown and Children’s hospital. Whether you’re here to enjoy the many festivals, conventions and night life, or here for work, you will enjoy this immaculate, private room, shared kitchen and living room, as a home away from home!

Guest access

The space

neighborhood_overview: This walkable, bikeable neighborhood, a short 1.5 miles from downtown Columbus and it’s major highways, is one of Columbus’ most coveted areas. A hybrid of urban flair and neighborhood warmth, Grandview’s vibes are at the same time laid-back and buzzing with energy. Stroll the wide, tree-lined sidewalks of Grandview Ave amid the hum of cafe-table chatter. Discover specialized independent shops, curated New-York style boutiques, a chocolatier’s gorgeous handmade truffles, independent breweries, top-rated coffee roasters, cutting-edge salons, and of course, world-class restaurants that use fresh, locally-sourced ingredients. The electric mix of restaurants here have consistently been recognized by critics and diners alike for their cuisine, ambience, and outstanding attention to detail. Grandview is also home to a collection of award-winning craft microbreweries and taprooms. A hub of creative culture and out-of-the-ordinary experiences, Grandview offers an array of guided food and drink
host_about:
Hello, my name is Joe - I was born and raised in Ohio and love Airbnb which means you’ll receive high service and quality, local recommendations to make the most of your trip. Feel free to instantly book or message me, I’m happy to answer any specific questions in advance.

By day, I’m a consultant. 
By night, I’m a friends/family man and an Ohio sports junkie. 

I’m a well traveled Airbnb guest and have pulled a lot of inspiration from other properties so I know what great hosts should do to create a comfortable guest experience. Be sure to ask me about a few of my favorite things on our welcome sheet.

Make yourself at home!

Our location in the Franklinton neighborhood makes it a short ride to lots of great restaurants, art studios, breweries, and downtown Columbus.

The space
Your group will love the amazing renovation that was done to this historic home. An amazing local designer and contractor have designed this house to be the perfect short term rental. The first floor is an open kitchen and living room for your group to eat and socialize.The first floor also has a 1/2 bath and office/mud room. On the 2nd floor you will find 2 nice sized bedrooms with 1 full en-suite bathroom and another full bathroom. Up on the 3rd floor there is one huge room with 2
neighborhood_overview: Our neighborhood Franklinton is full of historic homes,  and is currently in a revitalization phase. There are lots of properties being renovated, and a few that still remain boarded and empty. Our area is full of families with children, and close to schools, parks, and churches. This area has experienced some crime in the past, but has improved in recent years. We have been in this area for over 5 years, and have never experienced any crime or safety issues. Most of our guests love the location and proximity to downtown. If you or your group are not comfortable with this, then you may consider booking a different house. Just message us, and we are happy to help you find the right house for your stay!
host_about: I continue to be excited about Airbnb and home-sharing every day! I enjoy hosting guests, I LOVE to travel, and I really love meeting new people. I am a real estate broker that owns my own business, and I feel that my calling in life is to making spaces for people to enjoy. 5 things I can't live without are live music, friends, exploring new places, bacon, my drum set!

name: Modern Organic Oasis: Townhome in German Village
description:
Designer townhome with earthly, modern vibes throughout. Two private suites, each with their own en-suite bathroom - perfect for couples or small families. Located in the heart of quaint German Village, and steps to everything from coffee shops (including Starbucks), breweries, restaurants, parks, yoga & public transportation. Less than 1 mile to Downtown!

The space
A modern escape in the heart of German Village! Professionally designed & remodeled townhome with a light, airy aesthetic and natural textures throughout.

This listing is for one half of a remodeled two-unit duplex. This unit is two stories and about 1100 square feet. The first floor has a living room, dining room, kitchen and small powder room. A unique Y staircase leads up to the two newly remodeled private suites on the second floor.

The spacious master suite features a Tuft & Needle King memory foam bed, both down & down alternative pillows, a large bathroom with an ove
neighborhood_overview:
German Village is a vibrant place to stay, shop, and play. Walking the brick sidewalks, you'll discover a neighborhood full of urban gardens, beautiful historic homes built over 100 years ago, and carefully dispersed small businesses. As said on the German Village visitor's website, “What we have can't be replicated. We live this way — and protect it with great passion — because we understand that what we have is a neighborhood like no other." We couldn't agree more.

Schiller Park is a pleasant 8 minute walk from the property through some of the most charming streets in German Village, making it easy to go for a walk/run, have a picnic, bring the kids to the playground, and enjoy free performances of Shakespeare in the Park in the summertime. The park also has basketball courts and tennis courts.

Another one of our favorite parks is Scioto Audubon Metro Park, which is located .8 miles from the house. The park has a large rock climbing wall, walking paths (both
host_about:
Hi! We’re Catherine & Bryan: husband & wife, small business owners, designers and Superhosts. After living in NYC, we decided to move to Columbus, OH in 2013 in search of a better quality of life. We’ve welcomed thousands of guests to our properties in Italian Village and German Village since 2014, and have loved sharing our homes and our city with guests from near and far.

Find us on IG @beginninginthemiddle and @thevillagehost.

name: Apartment in Historic Olde Towne East - Bryden Rd
description:
This 2nd-floor apartment is inside historic 970 Bryden Road, a Mission Revival house, built circa 1890. The apartment is professionally cleaned between each and every stay. Free parking abounds, and it is 6 minutes to downtown destinations (including Nationwide Arena) and 12 minutes to Ohio State.

The space
Features key-code access, independent climate control, and a very large kitchen space. You will enjoy this entire 2nd floor apartment to yourself. It consists of a bedroom, bathroom and kitchen. The style and look of the building and apartment is historic. It features original wood double-hung windows. The unit is furnished with a queen size bed, night stands, a small desk, bench, and luggage shelf, dining room table and chair set.

Guest access
You have access to an enclosed back stairwell, a fenced-in back yard, the basement with washer/dryer (free), and the entire apartment.

Other things to note
Maximum 2 guests
neighborhood_overview: This apartment is located in Olde Towne East, a neighborhood located in the historic Near East Side of Columbus. It is nestled between Downtown, Franklin Park, Old Oaks, and King-Lincoln. The area has over 1,000 homes, some as old as the 1830s, and more than 50 architectural styles including Italianate, Queen Anne and Victorian. These homes were built by many of the famous individuals of Columbus including industrialists, lawyers, judges, teachers, architects, mayors, governors, and legislators, many of whom shaped the city.

name: Welcoming 1BD/1BA Apt by Downtown, German Village
description:
This s. High Street apartment is located in Merion Village, near Downtown, German Village, Brewery District, and Children's Hospital. With easy access to I-71, you will be centrally located to all that Columbus has to offer! The apartment is within walking distance to some local restaurants and a 5 minute drive to downtown restaurants and bars. This apartment is located on s. High St, one of the main roads through Columbus, and you may hear occasional road traffic. Off-street parking available.

The space
Living Room:
The living room offers an open space to relax. A couch, loveseat, and reading chair offer plenty of space to sit and work. The TV comes with a fire stick so you can login to your streaming services. Bar stools at the island countertop provide an easy work space.

Kitchen:
Cook all your meals, or heat up your take-out, in this full kitchen. Pots, skillets, baking dishes, utensils, and dinnerware are included. No dishwasher avail
neighborhood_overview:
Located just south of downtown, the apartment is centrally located to all the wonderful things Columbus has to offer. We are a 5 minute drive to downtown and the Columbus Convention Center, 10 minutes to THE Ohio Stadium and Franklin Park Conservatory, 2.5 miles to Children's Nationwide Hospital and Ohio Health Grant Medical Center, and only 10 minutes to Nationwide Arena.

The neighborhood could be considered transitional. It is located in Merion Village but is close to the southern border of German Village. The apartment is located on a major road through Columbus. It is close to restaurants, bars, and shops.

name: Entire 2-Unit Duplex in Charming German Village
description:
Newly remodeled 2-unit duplex in charming German Village! Great for a larger group looking to stay together in the same building, but still have some privacy. Each side has 2 bedrooms, 2.5 bathrooms, a kitchen, dining room, living room and smart TV w/Netflix and Sling. Located right off High St -- steps to coffee shops, breweries, restaurants, parks, yoga & public transportation.

The space
This listing is for our full duplex (both sides of the building) including our Vintage Townhome unit and Modern Townhome unit. Both units have separate entrances and basements.

The first floor of each unit has a living room, dining room, kitchen and small powder room. The living rooms feature LED Smart TVs with Netflix and Sling (cable), and decorative fireplaces.

The dining tables on each side seat 4-6.

The kitchens in both unites are newly renovated and fully stocked. A Nespresso machine with pods is available to you during your sta
neighborhood_overview:
German Village is a vibrant place to stay, shop, and play. Walking the brick sidewalks, you'll discover a neighborhood full of urban gardens, beautiful historic homes built over 100 years ago, and carefully dispersed small businesses. As said on the German Village visitor's website, “What we have can't be replicated. We live this way — and protect it with great passion — because we understand that what we have is a neighborhood like no other." We couldn't agree more.

Schiller Park is a pleasant 8 minute walk from the property through some of the most charming streets in German Village, making it easy to go for a walk/run, have a picnic, bring the kids to the playground, and enjoy free performances of Shakespeare in the Park in the summertime. The park also has basketball courts and tennis courts.

Another one of our favorite parks is Scioto Audubon Metro Park, which is located .8 miles from the house. The park has a large rock climbing wall, walking paths (both
host_about:
Hi! We’re Catherine & Bryan: husband & wife, small business owners, designers and Superhosts. After living in NYC, we decided to move to Columbus, OH in 2013 in search of a better quality of life. We’ve welcomed thousands of guests to our properties in Italian Village and German Village since 2014, and have loved sharing our homes and our city with guests from near and far.

Find us on IG @beginninginthemiddle and @thevillagehost.

description:
Looking for a home away from home? This furnished apartment is a favorite of executives from OSU, Cardinal Health, and other local organizations! Features include: ✔ 2 bed/2 bath
✔ Fast WiFi
✔ Free Garage Parking
✔ Washer & Dryer

✔ Fitness Center
✔ Professionally Decorated

We know you’ll love this luxury downtown apartment. Book now while your dates are still available. :)

The space
Step out from our brand new apartment building and you're just a short walk from all the best things about downtown Columbus!

A few features that our past guest have loved:

- Just steps from the beautiful Scioto Mile walking/biking trail along the river!
- Bike storage rooms on most floors
- Spotlessly Clean
- No steps! Elevator access
- Designer-decorated w/modern furniture and tasteful decor
- Easy self-checkin via secure door keypad
neighborhood_overview:
This apartment is located in a new luxury community called River & Rich in downtown Columbus.

It’s nestled along the river, perfectly located to be close enough to the action for easy access, yet far enough away to enjoy peace, quiet, and easy parking. You'll love all the art and hand-painted murals.

The apartment is walkable to breweries, coffee shops, restaurants, and other attractions...many just a few steps from our door.

It's super easy to get anywhere downtown from our place...by car, bicycle, scooter, Uber/Lyft, walking, etc.

When we give people tours of our place, many of them end up saying they'd love to live here. :)
host_about: Hi there! My wife and I are the founders of Epicurean Properties; a small business based in Columbus, OH. I’m passionate about travel and hospitality, and she’s a talented interior designer. This business allows us to blend all of our favorite things together. We enjoy staying at top hotels and rentals around the world and learning from them in order to create awesome experiences for our own guests. Feel free to contact us if you have any questions!

neighborhood_overview: Franklinton is an up and coming neighborhood that still has some rough spots (abandoned/boarded up houses) amongst newly renovated and very nice homes. host_about:
I was born and raised in Oregon. I went to school at the University of Georgia where I graduated with an Engineering Degree and swam and competed for the university at the NCAA level all four years.

for you business travelers,

Historic character & modern style meet in this XL sun-filled loft-style studio condo w/high ceilings & tall windows overlooking the Short North arches across High St from The Joseph Le Meridien Hotel. All wood floors (no carpet). full granite kitchen, home office, HDTV, Wi-Fi, W/D, luxury bedding.

STRICTLY ENFORCED: NO SMOKING/VAPING, NO PARTIES/EVENTS & NO PETS. See HOUSE RULES.

The space
One of the largest units in this historic condo building in the heart of the Short North Arts District. The unit is approx. 550sf with a wide open floor plan, high ceilings and huge east windows. Newly refinished original oak wood floors (no carpet). New granite kitchen. Living room area has a big sofa that comfdrotbaly sleeps an extra guest, 55" smart HDTV, home office desk w/high-speed wired & Wi-Fi internet, & lounge chair Bedroom area has designer uph
neighborhood_overview: This property is located in the base of the Short North Arts District, next to "The Cap", which connects the Arena District to the Short North. All manner of dining and entertainment venues are literally at your doorstep, as well as Goodale Park, which is great for a jog or relaxing next to the Lily Pond. The Convention Center is 1 block away; so is The North Market, a great dining spot.

name: 42 Hawks Carriage House - The City Cottage - Unique | Cozy
description:
The City Cottage is a bright and fresh space that provides the perfect space to stay while exploring Columbus! This house has been renovated and designed to be a great use of space, and provide everything needed for a short stay. Our historic guest house has a bedroom and full en-suite bathroom upstairs, and downstairs is and open kitchen/dinning/living space. Just a 5 minute drive to downtown Columbus, the City Cottage is tucked away in the exciting Franklinton arts district.

The City Cottage is a historic carriage house, that has been lovingly restored into a beautiful short term rental house. From the moment you enter, this bright space invites you in to stay a while.

The first floor has the perfect sized kitchen, complete with everything needed to prepare a delicious meal. is open to the living room, and also a dinning nook. There is a 1/2 bath on the first floor. Our living room has a sleeper couch.

Upstairs is a lovely bedroom and full bathroom.T
neighborhood_overview:
Our neighborhood Franklinton is situated just west of Downtown Columbus, and is full of historic homes. This neighborhood has experienced many phases through out it's existence, and is currently in a revitalization phase. There are lots of properties being renovated, and some that still remain boarded and empty. This area has experienced some crime in the past, but has improved in recent years.

Franklinton has experienced several great floods in the past, and has been somewhat neglected throughout the middle to late part of the 1900's. The Franklinton Floodwall, completed in 2004, is 7 miles long, cost $134 million. The wall's completion has released the area from being considered a floodplain, as well as releasing the previous building restrictions that often prevented development in the past. As a result, commercial and industrial activities are starting to grow in the Franklinton Area.

The City of Columbus is focusing on creating a new Short North style neigh

name: Capital City Retreat
description:
Quality quarentine quarters. Our efforts to offer our guests the most sanitized living space is unmatched.

Clean and completely remodeled townhouse condominium is fresh with new everything! It sits on the edge of Historic German Village and is close to all that this beautiful area has to offer. A great central location in Columbus, convenient to downtown, the Short North, the Arena District and the Brewery District as well as a 20 acre park and bike/scooter rentals.

The space
This is a very stylish and comfortable condominium! Similar to a brownstone condo, it's full of all the amenities. While not a huge space, it's well thought out and cozy. We tried to think of everything to make your stay relaxing and pleasant. All new mechanical work is complete including central heat and air. It still is in an old building and you will notice some sloping of the floors here and there, so don't think you've had one too many!

Guest access
T
neighborhood_overview: "You will find a few remnants of German culture, like the popular Schmidt’s Sausage Haus, but the dining scene ranges from delicate French patisserie at Pistacia Vera, to Spanish paella and tapas at Barcelona, to low-country pork and seafood at G. Michaels. A little further afield, The Crest Gastropub on Parsons offers outstanding food and drinks, while Skillet is the hotspot for hyper-local, hyper-delicious and hyper-filling breakfasts and brunches. The Kitchen helps you cook your own dinner in a fun, participatory and stylish environment. The 32-room Book Loft has been a favorite location to wander for generations, Helen Winnemore’s carries modern American crafts and Vernacular mixes breezy women's wear with home goods."... Experience Columbus

name: Updated German Village 2BR Condo Perfect Location!
description:
Our condo is a 2 bedroom/1 bath two story unit located on a beautiful cobblestone street in the historic German Village/Brewery District. The condo has been updated with new furnishings, 3 memory foam queen beds, and a pull out couch downstairs. High Street, German Village, and Downtown restaurants/bars are all a quick walk/uber from of our condo. We have parking directly outside the condo, an pet friendly fully fenced in backyard, washer/dryer, and all kitchen/bathroom ammenities provided.

The space
Location, location, location! We are located near the best Columbus has to offer. This is an ideal condo for couples, families, or groups of friends! We love this area & layout so much that we live in one of the other condos on the street. Our condo has been updated with brand new mattresses and furniture throughout the place. The house has 2 large bedrooms and 1 full bathroom, all located on the second floor. On the first floor, we have a pull-out couch, kitchen tab
neighborhood_overview: Our condo is immediately west of German Village, primarily oriented along High and Front Streets, in the Brewery District. Full of lively entertainment and dining options and the country’s largest resident theater company. It is further enhanced by large (23 acre) and well-kept Schiller Park, which has the lovely Huntington Garden, dozens of mature trees, a lake, tennis courts, picnic area, and people walking their dogs. 5 Minutes from Downtown Columbus, Steps to German Village,  10 minutes from Ohio State Campus and Ohio Stadium, 5 Minutes to the Columbus Convention center, 10 Minutes from the Columbus Airport, 5 Minutes to Nationwide Children’s Hospital, within walking distance to 12 4+ Star rated restaurants on Yelp!, walking distance to a large grocery store, and walking distance to the aforementioned Schiller Park. A warm, charming, historical, and walkable neighborhood which is also a diverse and friendly community. Again - I love this area so much, I live here!

name: Short North Kennels - ELVIS SUITE
description:
The BrewDog Kennels are our new, city center mini-hotels located above our BrewDog bars. Building on our award winning Doghouse hotel concept they give more people the chance to combine memorable hotel experience with amazing craft beers on their exploration.

The space
Check-in via our Short North bar and you'll find that all of our rooms are decked out in bespoke furnishings and a bevy of unexpected touches for all of our guests. Our rooms also feature all the necessary amenities for craft beer lovers including shower beer fridges, draft beer delivery and food room service and a record player. As always we are totally dog friendly and you can even request a dog bed so your furry friend can stay with you too!

Other things to note
As part of state regulations, we are required to charge for the in-room beer and alcohol amenities up front. This fee has been integrated into the cleaning fees. A price list with the cost of in-room amenities is l
neighborhood_overview: Located on High Street, in the heart of Columbus, the BrewDog Kennels are ideally situated for travelers to explore the city and beyond. With BrewDog Short North just below, the city hotbed for nightlife and entertainment within minutes’ walk, the Kennels are the perfect launching point and end to a craft beer crawl. We have tons of amazing BrewDog experiences at your fingertips in a short drive as well, so don't miss out on booking in for a Beer School or in for a Brewery Tour at our state-of-the-art brewery just up the road in Canal Winchester or enjoy our rooftop patio at BrewDog Franklinton!

name: Standard Room - Full Service B&B
description:
Located on the edge of downtown in the Short North Arts District, 50 Lincoln Short North Bed and Breakfast is nestled in a quiet residential neighborhood setting.
Each of our seven rooms feature in-room private full bath, free Wi-Fi, and cable TV. We also include free off-street parking and a delicious homemade breakfast every morning. Breakfast includes juice, hot coffee or tea, fresh fruit, yogurt, granola, and a specially prepared entrée each day (all food allergies can be accommodated).

The space
Room 1 is located on the second floor and features a queen size bed, writing desk, and rocking chair. Two windows looking to the north and east provide plenty of natural light. This room also has a full in-room private bathroom complete with tub/shower combo and hairdryer.

Guest access
Guests are welcome to make themselves at home in any of the public areas including the main parlor and the back porch. We have a microwave and guest fridge
neighborhood_overview: 50 Lincoln is a one minute walk from blocks of trendy shops, fabulous restaurants, unique art galleries, and exciting night life. We are just a half mile from the Greater Columbus Convention Center, a mile from Nationwide Arena, and less than two miles to The Ohio State University campus. Enjoy a quick walk through the neighborhood, grab a COGO Bike Share a block from our front door, or jump on the free CBUS on High Street to get around.
host_about: We are a full service Bed and Breakfast located in the Short North area of Columbus, Ohio.

name: 🔸Downtown Destination- Southern Orchards🔸
description:
Situated less than a block from Parsons Ave, the main road that unites German Village and Southern Orchards(arguably the hottest up and coming neighborhood in Columbus) our house has plenty to offer the traveler seeking a downtown Columbus experience. Although some areas nearby appear rough, we can assure you it’s as safe as anywhere in the city. The neighborhood is going through a massive transformation, lead initially by Children’s Hospital, who has dumped millions into developing the area.

The space
You have access to the entire house(one half of a duplex) with 3 bedrooms upstairs, and a kitchen, dining room and living room downstairs.

Guest access
Entire house.

Other things to note
This house is half of a duplex.

License number
2019-1234
neighborhood_overview: If you need a great cup of coffee and our keurig isn’t enough, walk to the corner of our street to Community Grounds, owned and operated by the friendly Joel. It’s a great spot! Further up Parsons Ave is Parsons North Brewing Company, a really great and trendy place to get a pint or two. If your looking for good restaurants, look no further than German Village or the short north. There are too many truely fantastic places to list, just ask me for individual recommendations depending on what you’re looking for.
host_about: Hello, I’m Russ! I love meeting new people and hosting is a bit of a passion of mine. I get great satisfaction and fulfillment from making others happy and comfortable, sooooo.... this is kind of right up my alley. I love my town and I love to travel as well. Since this picture of my son and I, my hair is shorter and my wife and I had a beautiful daughter. If you are new to Columbus and need advice or recommendations, or are a seasoned vet, don’t hesitate to reach out about anything. Thank you for looking!

Two separate living areas allows families and groups alike to spread out and do their own thing when desired while the large rooms, formal dining room, and a private, fenced in back yard presents an opportunity for even large gatherings to be shared.

The space
This beautiful craftsman home offers your family or group a great place to spend time together! Downstairs offers 2 living rooms, formal dinning room, kitchen and half bathroom. Upstairs guest will find a large updated full bathroom with shower and tub., and 3 spacious bedrooms. 2 rooms each have a double bed, and the 3rd room is set up a an office/sitting area.

Our backyard is a fenced in beautiful play space for little ones, or furry friends!

This charming yet eclectic home in an affluent, urban neighborhood supplies guests with easy access to entertainment all from within the confines of a quaint, family-friendly, neighborhood. We love the Clintonville area in Columbus, and would be happy to assist you with any recommendations you should need during your visit.

Where to go? : One thing I love about this house is how close you are to the freeway and yet accessible by walking to some amazing spots in Clintonville such as:

Flowers and Bread - a unique local bakery/cafe that also does flower arranging classes!

Coffee: Flowers and Bread, or Starbucks just a few more blocks!

Restaurants: To many to list them all but we love Northstar Cafe, Hot Chicken Takeover, Rusty Bucket, and Local Cantina!

Other Activities: The Columbus Park of Roses - One of Columbus's largest metro parks, and a beautiful rose garden that is an icon of the area.

Don't miss the bike/walking

description:
Short North dining & shopping, Convention Center, Nationwide Arena District, Goodale Park & North Market are all at your doorstep! Historic character meets modern style with whimsical decor, original wood floors & sunny private patio. High ceilings & tall west windows provide great light. Full kitchen, home office, HDTV, Wi-Fi, in-unit W/D. Queen bedroom + pull-out full-size sofa bed.

STRICTLY ENFORCED: NO SMOKING, NO PARTIES / EVENTS, AND NO PETS. See HOUSE RULES.

The space
Bright, open layout feels bigger than it is thanks to 10ft ceilings, huge windows and efficient design. Foyer entry has coat & laundry closets, full galley kitchen. Living room has sofa bed & lounge chair, HDTV, and home office desk. Bedroom has luxurious modern queen bed, attached full bath & closet. A motorized roller blind between the bedroom and living room provides privacy. Large sunny private patio off main living room gets great west sunlight.

Guest access
neighborhood_overview: This property is located in the base of the Short North Arts District, next to "The Cap", which connects the Arena District to the Short North. All manner of dining and entertainment venues are literally at your doorstep, as well as Goodale Park, which is great for a jog or relaxing next to the Lily Pond. The Convention Center is 1 block away; so is The North Market, a great place for lunch!

name: Comfy guest bedroom near Dublin, Worthington, OSU
description:
License number
2019-1483
host_about:
Howdy! I’m Jake. I’m originally from New York, and while I miss my friends and family back home (not to mention the beach!), I absolutely love my mid-west home here in Columbus, Ohio!
By day I’m a real estate investor and by night I’m a social butterfly with my friends. I'm also an Airbnb cohost where I mentor aspiring local hosts. I earned my Superhost status because I have high standards for value, cleanliness, and communication.
I enjoy travelling and creating new experiences. My favorite country is Guatemala. The people, the food and the historical sites are breathtaking. My favorite city is Chicago. Through these travels and coupled with my 14 years landlording, I’ve been fortunate to learn what makes a great host: a great home, with a friendly host, in an awesome neighborhood, and the ability to do the things you love! I try to ensure that each and every guest I host walks away with all of that and hopefully more.
My life motto is, well, really my grandmother’s advice, “Jakey, live with NO REGRETS” (I can hear her thick NYer accent now). Sometimes I guess we just need a little reminder of that… And so, I invite you to travel more and see the big, beautiful world we live in.

name: Brand New Large 2BR/1B Olde Towne East Townhouse
description:
Our 2 bedroom Olde Towne East townhouse has been updated througout! All new appliances in the kitchen and furnishings. All bedrooms have extremely comfortable memory foam mattresses. Furniture, fixtures, and bathroom are all also brand new. The townhouse is located in the heart of Olde Towne East next to many local restaurants and establishments. Our location offers convenient access to downtown, Convention Center, Short North, Nationwide Childrens, and Expo Center!

The space
The first floor has living room, dining room, and a gorgeous remodeled kitchen with all the conveniences. The second floor has 1 bedroom a memory foam queen mattress, and one full bathroom. The third floor has a very spacious 2nd bedroom with a queen size bed and queen size air mattress. Parking is not an issue at all as we have one off-street parking space next to the house and plenty of off street parking. We also offer a washer/dryer for your convenience.

VERY IMPORTANT - MA
neighborhood_overview: We are a located in Olde Towne East, which is a historic Near East Side neighborhood of Columbus, Ohio nestled between Downtown, Franklin Park, Old Oaks, and King-Lincoln. The area has over 1,000 homes, some as old as the 1830s, and more than 50 architectural styles including Italianate, Queen Anne and Victorian. This home is located in an amazing location offering quick access to a wide verity of restaurants, bars, coffee shops and more.  This location is within walking distances of of Franklin Park Conservatory and Botanical Gardens which is set within the 88 acres.  The location is perfect for any group who has plans in the Downtown, Short North, Convention Center, or German Village area.

name: Spacious Historic Home in Heart of Victorian Village 795
description:
This spacious, modern condo-home is located in the heart of the Victorian Village. Victorian Village is one of central Ohio's cores of fine residential architecture. The area is known for its Victorian houses and central location. Just a block away from North Market and the Columbus Convention Center and its northern boundary, West Fifth Avenue, is half a mile away from The Ohio State University.

Our customer service hours are from 8am to 10pm. Please reach out to us if you're checkin in late before 10pm that way we can assure a smooth check in.

Victorian Village is consistently ranked a top Columbus neighborhood. It is ranked the ninth most walkable neighborhood in Columbus with a walk score of eighty-three. Some homes have been split into rented apartments, but many are nationally registered historical landmarks
A number of bars and restaurants can be found along the eastern boundary on North High Street. The neighboring neighborhood, The Short No
neighborhood_overview: Victorian Village is consistently ranked a top Columbus neighborhood. It is ranked the ninth most walkable neighborhood in Columbus with a walk score of eighty-three. Some homes have been split into rented apartments, but many are nationally registered historical landmarks A number of bars and restaurants can be found along the eastern boundary on North High Street. The neighboring neighborhood, The Short North, shares the High Street border with Victorian Village and is known for its entertainment in nightlife and dining among other characteristics. Other bars, restaurants, and sources of entertainment can be found scattered throughout the neighborhood.

name: Steps from High St. | Work From Here | Sanitized
description:
This listing is practicing COVID-19 sanitation practices!

Please check out the longer description below to see what cleaning procedures we have in place.

We are here for any displaced students, traveling medical professionals, or anyone seeking self-quarantine or respite from COVID-19.

Stay healthy, friends! Together we can get through this!

The space
Our COVID-19 Sanitation cleaning procedure includes:

1. Washing our hands and wearing disposable sanitary gloves or rubber cleaning gloves
2. Our cleaning solutions are at least 70% alcohol
3. Cleaning only with disposable wipes. Using cotton or microfibre otherwise.
4. Using a color safe sanitizing spray to sanitize soft surfaces such as furniture, edges of curtains and decorative pillows
5. Disinfecting all light switches, windows
6. Disinfecting the thermostat, railings, garbages, and all surfaces
7. Washing all dishes/utensils
8

description:
This 1920’s home is newly updated in the Clintonville/University District area of Columbus, OH. The home is located near the beautiful Glen Echo Ravine, perfect for bird watching, leisurely, quiet strolls and picnicking.
Our humble abode is just 2 miles from The Ohio State University football stadium!
Both The Ohio State Fairgrounds/Expo center and MAPFRE stadium are just a 5min drive. See our suggested food establishment and entertainment ideas in our welcome to Columbus book.

The space
The home is located on a busy street (Indianola Ave.), but has an entry level, covered front porch and a back entrance with 2 off street parking spaces. The first floor offers a cozy living room space, dining room, full sized kitchen with counter top seating and full bath. There are four bedrooms on the second floor, along with a full bathroom. There is full sized washer and dryer located in the basement to use at your convenience (some soap provided).

Co

The area is full of laid-back cafes, gastropubs, and indie shops selling records and locally made crafts are clustered on N. High Street and Indianola Avenue. A paved bike trail, winding along the Olentangy River through several parks, connects to Downtown Columbus and northern suburbs.

After returning to Columbus we decided to explore our love of renovation and become Airbnb hosts.

name: The Magnolia/Olde Towne East/3BDRM Home
description:
Welcome to our newly renovated home, in the heart of Olde Towne East. With easy access to restaurants, bars, and parks.

The space
Due to the Coronavirus we are taking great care to disinfect frequently touched areas.
We block our calendar for 24 hours in between reservations to allow the virus to dry up. Then we go in open the windows and get to work so that our guests can feel safe during their stay with us.
The Magnolia is a cozy three bedroom -one bath townhome in the heart of Olde Towne East. Nestled in between Columbus, Franklin Park, Olde Oaks, and King Lincoln. This home offers a fully equipped kitchen for dining in along with a dining area open to the family room. Upstairs you’ll find 3 bedrooms and bath. The attic is an office, wake up early, have a cup of coffee, and work from home in privacy. Nightlife in this area is delightful. We recommend Olde Town Tavern , Oracle, and Olde Oak!

Guest access
Guest access is thro
neighborhood_overview:
Olde Towne East is one of Columbus's oldest neighborhoods, located on the near east side of Columbus. The area has more than 1000 homes that were built in the 1870's.
Today, Olde Towne East is going through a major upswing. Homes are being renovated and sold to Upper Class families. This upswing is due to a string of new businesses emerging in this area. Our neighborhood is full of restaurants and Bars.
During your stay you can try Olde Town Tavern, Way Down Yonder, Yellow Brick Pizza, Upper Cup Coffe, and 39 Below Frozen Yogurt. You can grab drinks at the Olde Towne Tavern or Camelot Cellars. This town with the double E's is one of the coolest places to explore in the Columbus Area.

neighborhood_overview: At the beginning of this century, people chose to live in Olde Towne East for social status. Today, the residents choose to live here for the unique styling of the houses and their appreciation of the diverse community. The varied cultural and racial backgrounds and economic levels that are present create a unique environment not found in any other Columbus neighborhood. Olde Towne East is a pedestrian-friendly neighborhood in a grid layout. The Columbus Metropolitan Library, The Columbus Museum of Art, Franklin University, Capital University Law School, and Columbus College of Art and Design are all within a 15 minute walk. The entire downtown of Columbus is easily accessible by bicycle or public transportation. City, county, state and federal government agencies (including the Capitol Building of the State of Ohio), several regional and national banks, insurance companies, and major corporate headquarters are all accessible without need for an automobile. There is convenient access t
host_about: Brad and Jake have been married for 5 years and together for 13. Originally from Milwaukee, Jake moved to Columbus in 2005 to attend The Ohio State University. neighborhood_overview:
The neighborhood is a melting pot of diverse backgrounds that captures the busyness of Columbus. If you are adverse to diversity, this place may not be suitable to you.

Out of town folks **This property is not within walking distance** to Columbus Nightlife and recommend short drive to:
* 1 mi to German Village, a famous historic neighborhood (tons of restaurants, bars & stores there, including “The Sycamore”, “Schmidt's Sausage”, “Thurman Café” featured on TV)
* 1 mi to Nationwide Children's Hospital
* 1.5 mi to grocery store “Kroger” and "Giant Eagle"
* 2.5 mi to Downtown Columbus
* 3.2 mi to Greater Columbus Convention Center
* 3.3 mi to Arena District
* 5.2 mi to COSI Columbus Science Center
* 5.5 mi to MAPFRE Stadium
* 10 mi to Easton Town Center, Shopping Plaza
* Other Restaurants and café shops including; Scrambler Marie's, Alchemy Café, Plank Café & Pizzeria, Roosters, the Skillet and More!

Welcome to LuxBox Lofts! We’re consistently voted best airbnb in Columbus, and guests love us so much they usually book with us again. Newly renovated beautiful home, with property manager minutes away to take care of all guests needs immediately. My husband and I love traveling just like everyone else here!   I currently manage an Academy that we own and host 6 AirBnB units in Ohio while my husband is a banker.

We currently live in Ohio. As far as my traveling background, I’ve traveled all over the US, visited 10 different countries, and lived in 3 different countries; Indonesia, Singapore and U.S. 

I appreciate all the experiences I had in each destination. I am definitely looking forward to more experiences in other places and hope you do too!

Welcome Business traveler, gamer, coffee addict, to your 2 bedroom 2 bathroom retreat. This modern apartment sleeps 6 guests, has a full kitchen, 2 full bathrooms, with 1 bath/shower combo. name: Upscale 1BR Apt in Downtown
description:
Nothing is more important to the us than the health and safety of our communities. We are monitoring the situation very closely, and we would like to share the additional precautions that have been recently added. All amenities at this property have been closed. We have increased our cleaning standards, specifically as it relates to cleaning and disinfecting surfaces. This is all very necessary for the safety of guests, and we must do our part to keep this community safe.

The space
STAYING LONG TERM? Contact us for up to 25% off your stay!

We have a zero-tolerance policy for parties or gatherings. We use a noise sensor to detect the noise level inside the suite, a people counter which counts the number of people nearby, in addition to numerous neighbors who are understandably more sensitive during this time. The guest amount on your reservation must match the number of guests that will be inside the suite at any given time. We do utilize our local law
neighborhood_overview: Our suite is nestled right in the heart of Downtown Columbus’ River South District. This recently-transformed neighborhood has quickly gone from a long-forgotten area to a vibrant urban destination with a burgeoning nightlife and arts scene. River South is home to some of the best bars, restaurants, and coffee shops that Columbus has to offer. Take in some fresh air in this river-side neighborhood and go for a walk along the Scioto Greenway and through Bicentennial Park.
host_about: Frontdesk offers trusted travelers exactly the stay they want - their kind of place, in their kind of neighborhood.

name: Spacious Downtown Apartment
description:
This is a light filled spacious first floor unit that has been completely refurbished. With original hard wood floors, and cool farm kitchen, eat in area for morning coffee, it's a great unit to relax in afterwork. The unit is close to downtown in up and coming Southern Orchards, minutes from Children's hospital.

The space
Everything has been touched in this unit. We have completely refurbished, the unit (actually the whole building) and put a contemporary spin on a spacious open layout common a century ago. The kitchen has quartz countertops, upgraded white appliances (for the look and feel) and plenty of counter top for cooking. You can entertain formally in the dining area, or eat casually on the butcher block eat in area. The unit has windows all the way around, and is light filled all day long.
neighborhood_overview: Our neighborhood is very transitional.  There have been constant renovations and sales over the last 5 years and it is vastly transformed.  However, it still has some grit, and it is diverse socially and economically.  There are still renovations happening, you can see them as you drive through the streets.  A few boarded houses remain, but overall, new home owners have infused a sense of pride that you will see driving the streets.  That said, it is still in transition.
host_about: I am a developer who has a passion for creating new urban experiences in areas that are developing and close to the core of what's happening in the city.  Equally I love to travel, and spend 6 to 7 months a year traveling both within the USA and throughout the world.  I take my job with me and enjoy the benefits of experiencing new living environments while working a job I love!  I look forward to sharing my developed properties with the Short Stay community.

name: Rest and Recharge
description:
Hi and thanks for checking out our space! Katie and I (William) have a beautiful home built in 1900 that is located directly across from the historic Ohio Dominican University. Conveniently located minutes from the AIRPORT and within very easy access to i670/i270. Also a short drive/ride to downtown Columbus and the Short North. We have a minimum stay of 30 days.

The space
By booking with us you will have a private room (15x18) with a King sized bed and access to our WiFi. You will share a common bath located on the same floor and will also have access to the kitchen for filtered water, coffee and to store leftovers from dining out. We will also allow you to share the common dining room as well as have access to the laundry room.
host_about: I am a working professional currently at Abbott Nutrition. Columbus Ohio is home and I am a huge Ohio State fan! I love to travel and go on outdoor adventures around the world. As much as I enjoy to be active, being comfortable at home or while away is a top priority for me. I am also always excited to meet new friends!

Street parking in the front is available. The unit is fully equipped with a w
neighborhood_overview: Olde Towne East is a neighborhood located in the historical Near East Side of Columbus, Ohio and is one of Columbus' oldest neighborhoods. One block away you will find a few local hang-outs and eateries to include Yellowbrick Pizza, Olde Towne Tavern, Lifestyle Cafe (Vegan), Camelot Cellars (Winery) and Our Bar & Lounge. A few blocks further you will find my daily coffee shop, Upper Cup Coffee; a breakfast favorite, Hangover Easy; brunch and cocktails at Olde Oak and the perfect patio at Germut Biergarten. All in walking distance! There are also a handful of great shops, gardens and parks in the area.

neighborhood_overview:
Our neighborhood Franklinton is situated just west of Downtown Columbus, and is full of historic homes. This neighborhood has experienced many phases through out it's existence, and is currently in a revitalization phase. There are lots of properties being renovated, and some that still remain boarded and empty. This area has experienced some crime in the past, but has improved in recent years.

Franklinton has experienced several great floods in the past, and has been somewhat neglected throughout the middle to late part of the 1900's. The Franklinton Floodwall, completed in 2004, is 7 miles long, cost $134 million. The wall's completion has released the area from being considered a floodplain, as well as releasing the previous building restrictions that often prevented development in the past. As a result, commercial and industrial activities are starting to grow in the Franklinton Area.

name: Private Backyard | 2-Car Garage | German Village
description:
Nestled just south of downtown Columbus is one of the most charming neighborhoods anywhere —German Village. Brick lined streets, gas lanterns, and some of the most inspiring historical homes will surround you when you stay in this 2 bedroom, 1 bathroom cottage.

The space
This property is rare in German Village. We offer a private backyard with a large patio and dining table. Pull your vehicle into a two car garage and avoid searching for parking.

The first floor greets you with our fully stocked kitchen, complete with gas range oven, coffee maker with all the fixings, dishwasher, full fridge, and everything you will need to cook at home. The home's only full bath, which includes a tub and shower combo, is just off the kitchen on the first floor.

To the left of the kitchen is a living room where you'll find our modem/router combo with blazing fast wifi with download speeds of up to 200 mbps! We've got plenty of seating so you and your small
neighborhood_overview: The laid-back German Village is known for charming brick houses built by 19th-century immigrants along Beck, Mohawk, and Deshler streets. Shops selling books, traditional fudge, and handmade jewelry mingle with art galleries, German pubs, American bistros, and artisan coffee shops. In summer, the Actors’ Theatre Columbus stages outdoor Shakespeare and other plays in Schiller Park with its fountains and flower beds.
host_about: I. Love. Houses and Hosting! I’ve been an Airbnb host since 2013 when I used to live in New York City. I moved to Columbus, Ohio to restore homes and Host travelers full time in 2018. Rest assured our listings are put together with thought and care. Cleanliness and your comfort are our top priority. You'll love our spaces!

name: Old Towne Brick Beauty
description:
The house is an old Victorian-style home. All hardwood floors throughout with ornate fireplaces in almost every room. The kitchen and the bathroom were both remodeled in the last year. The home is fully stocked and furnished. The bedrooms boast a king-size Tempurpedic memory foam mattress, a queen size Sealy pillow top mattress and a twin bunk bed. The living room provides a pull-out sofa couch and flat-screen smart TV.

The home was built in 1890 and still holds a lot of its original character.

The space
The property is a two-story home situated in the unique Old Towne East neighborhood. Perfect for family gatherings or visiting your loved ones. Here are some details on this amazing home:

• 3 bedrooms.
• 1 bathroom. Please note, you must access the bathroom from the third bedroom.
• 1,536 sq. ft. of indoor living space.
• On a 1,742 sq ft. lot with a back porch and barbeque area.
• Professionally decorated
• Large

description:
Spacious 3 story townhouse centrally located on the Northeast side of Columbus in the Gahanna New Albany area. Major restaurants and grocery stores within minutes

There are restaurants and grocery stores within a 5 minutes drive. Just a 10 minute drive to Easton Mall for shopping.
