name: Cozy, updated basement 2 bedroom apartment
description:
Our remodeled two bedroom unit has a relaxing, modern feel. We are right on the edge of High St. & Morse Rd. in the Beechwold/Clintonville area, close to diverse restaurants and shops and convenient to different parts of town. Soaking in our deep tub, sleeping on a memory foam mattress, helping yourself to a complimentary cup of Keurig coffee at the kitchenette bar, or relaxing with your favorite TV show. Work or study at our work station. It is a quiet, comfortable, and peaceful environment.

The space
Self check in with a private entrance. Parking spots available for you in the driveway behind the house. Desk and chair available if you have business to take care of.

Guest access
We remolded our basement into a rental unit with 2 bedrooms, full kitchen, full bathroom, and a small living room. guest has full access in these areas.

There are also some very desirable metro parks near us where you can walk or hike- High Banks, Inniswood Metro Gardens, and Park of Roses. The zoo and libraries are some of the best in the country. description:
Close to downtown Columbus and surrounded by historical homes and brick streets, this townhome is located in the highly sought after German Village neighborhood. You are minutes away from some of the best shops, cafes, and restaurants Columbus has to offer. The convention center, Nationwide Arena, and Nationwide Children's Hospital are also incredibly close by. We take pride in our hospitality and furnishings. You and rest assured this is a fantastic home for your short-term stay in Columbus!

The space
This all brick German Village townhome is quite spacious and close to everything Downtown Columbus has to offer!

We offer central air throughout the first and second floors. The third floor is cooled off via window units.

name: Short North Studio @ Goodale Park
description:
Enjoy your stay at this cozy garden-level studio, tucked into a small residential building along Goodale Park. The studio features a private outside entrance with a keypad lock and is easily walkable to some of the city's best restaurants and entertainment. Walk to the convention center in 10 minutes! Street parking available for an additional $3/night. The studio is in a vintage building with neighbors upstairs - not a great fit for light sleepers or for noisy groups.

The space
This is a recently updated studio apartment on the "garden" level of a small residential building (you will enter from ground level and go down half a flight of stairs to the apartment).

*****

The studio features a queen bed and a fold-down futon which can sleep two additional guests. The TV has a cable connection (but it is not a "smart" TV for streaming your own content). The kitchen has basic appliances and cookware - pots, pans, plates, bowls, silverware,
neighborhood_overview: The Short North is home to some of the best restaurants, shopping, art galleries, and night life in the city.  This neighborhood draws a healthy blend of graduate students, young professionals, and families.  Goodale Park is right across the street and is home to ComFest, summer concert series, tennis courts, and some really big trees.  The building is also along the route for the Cap City Half Marathon, the Columbus Marathon, the Pride Parade, and the Doo Dah parade!
host_about:
Hi, we're Kate and Nat!  We live here in the "Short North" neighborhood of Columbus, near the properties that we manage.

We are both graduates of The Ohio State University - Go Bucks!  Kate is a physical therapist and Nat has a background in IT & management consulting.  We love being Airbnb hosts and hearing about all the exciting reasons that people travel to Columbus!

neighborhood_overview:
Our neighborhood is in a lovely pocket of Columbus. Lined with beautiful trees, a great Park right down the street & remarkably quiet day & night.
Filled with neighbors that care about their properties & each other.

☆Please observe our "No Smoking" &
"No Party" rule Be quiet, courteous guests.
host_about:
Hello! 
My name is Christy, I'm your Host.
My Daughter Emily & I have been Super Hosts since early 2018. 
We take pride in making sure our home is spotless & our Guests are comfortable!  
We understand how expensive hotels can be. Whether you're traveling for work or pleasure, this is a cozy place to rest your head.

We even have a Caretaker (Brian) that will help you with anything you need around our home. 
He is very friendly (but values your privacy), he really knows Columbus!  If you have any questions or need anything, just call/text him. He lives in the apt. on the lower level & has a completely separate entrance.  
He works most nights & is only available during the day (9am-8pm). 
Both of our phone #'s are in the welcome letter on kitchen counter. Call or text anytime. 

We are a Military family & welcome Military families to stay with us!

We look forward to meeting you!

name: Brand New Downtown Columbus condo with a view- 516
description:
Welcome to our newest Columbus urban environment apartment community.
With eclectic shops, restaurants, and short proximity to Columbus Commons, Harlow is the premier location. Perfect for a weekend away or business travel, this property will not disappoint. Here at Harlow your location is your biggest amenity!
We made a list of the urban hotspots that are steps from your front door!
The Walrus, The Little Palace Restaurant, 16 Bit Bar + Arcade, Mikey’s Late Night Slice, Pecan Penny’s and Hadley’s Bar and Kitchen.
Also, a short distance to Columbus Commons which is a six-acre park set within the scenic Downtown skyline.
Children’s Hospital - 1.4 miles
Columbus State Community College - 1.2 miles
Amenities within our property:
Secure building access, bike storage, community-wide Wi-Fi, and a coffee bar are just a few of the additional amenities Harlow offers.
We offer covered off-street parking with elevator access, 24-hour
neighborhood_overview:
We are excited to introduce Columbus’ newest apartment community Harlow. This property is for the socially connected, free-spirited, and design-conscious person who thrives in an urban environment, and it’s ideal for those who want to stay with a smaller footprint. With eclectic shops, restaurants, and short proximity to Columbus Commons, Harlow is the premier location.

The Walrus, The Little Palace Restaurant, 16 Bit Bar + Arcade, Mikey’s Late Night Slice, Pecan Penny’s and Hadley’s Bar and Kitchen.
Also, a short distance to Columbus Commons which is a six-acre park set within the scenic Downtown skyline. It is a gathering space for Central Ohio, a backyard for Downtown residents, and an attraction for people of all ages. Events for all ages are happening here throughout the year such as concerts, food truck festivals and more.
Children’s Hospital - 1.4 miles
Columbus State Community College - 1.2 miles
host_about:
Hello everyone! I am very excited to be apart of this wonderful community and make all my guests feel right at home. 

You can expect very fast communication and a response to any and all questions or concerns within minutes! 

Born and raised in Columbus, Oh. 

I LOVE to travel with my Wife and explore other great Airbnbs. Whether that's on the beach, lake or in the city! 

I look forward to connecting with people from all over the world as a host and traveler!

name: ★ Under the Sea ★ Private Home with Game Room ★
description:
Enjoy your stay in this newly renovated 3-bedroom house in Southern Orchards, a developing urban neighborhood near Nationwide Children’s Hospital. 15% off stays of seven nights or more.

Inside, you’ll find a game room complete with arcade machines, shuffleboard, and skeeball. Each bedroom has an adjustable bed and 55-inch smart TV. Fenced backyard comes with a grill, patio seating, and a small bocce ball court.

15 min to airport, 10 min to OSU, and 5 min to Nationwide Children’s Hospital.

The space
• Three bedrooms, one bathroom.
• Smart TVs in the living room and each bedroom, with access to any of your streaming subscriptions and complementary Hulu TV service.
• Fully equipped kitchen with new stainless steel appliances.
• Game room includes arcade cabinets, skeeball, and shuffleboard.
• Fenced in back yard, great for pets.
• Off street parking for two cars in the garage. Plenty of on street parking if you need m
neighborhood_overview: Southern Orchards is a developing urban neighborhood near Nationwide Children’s hospital undergoing rapid redevelopment. It's a diverse area, and its central location makes it easy to get anywhere around Columbus.
host_about:
I’m a moderately geeky real estate investor who prefers to be outdoors and is an avid hiker, fisher, runner and explorer. 

I live in one of my favorite places, Columbus, Ohio.  I provide fun, affordable, high end, safe and memorable vacation homes and event venues in and around the city.  I take pride in my properties and always respond to guests' needs.

I love great food and cocktails and am full of suggestions for fulfilling local experiences.  

I love to travel.  A few of my favorite destinations include Barcelona, Jaipur, Paris, Santorini, Athens, London, and Manhattan Montana.

I love animals.  I own cats and grew up with dogs.   I design my homes to be pet friendly.  I would love to meet your pets.

name: Charming Cottage close to downtown Columbus
description:
Charming urban cottage in Merion Village near downtown Columbus. Walk to German Village and Merion Village restaurants & Schiller Park.

The space
Built in 1920, our cottage features modern conveniences while preserving much of the original charm. We chose comfy and neutral furnishings and highlighted them with art from local artists (we LOVE supporting local businesses!). We have new mattresses, couch, linens, etc. relax in the vintage claw foot tub! Stream your favorite shows on the 55' smart tv or spend an evening playing board games that are provided. Cook a meal in the fully stocked kitchen. Swing on the porch swing overlooking the perennials in the fenced in backyard. Walk to many nearby restaurants, coffee shops, etc.

Guest access
Check yourself in with keyless entry!

Other things to note
This host committed to Airbnb's 5-step enhanced cleaning process.

License number
2020-1971

name: The Playful London Flat—DOWNTOWN/ARENA/CONV CENTER
description:
Warm, modern, quiet flat w/private balcony in heart of Downtown Columbus steps from pubs, cafes, Capitol Square, Arena District & riverfront. Wood floors throughout, granite kitchen, tasteful decor. In-unit laundry, cable, high-speed Wi-Fi & home office. Secure elevator building has dramatic Sky Lounge & roof patio, too! Plenty of parking options nearby (garages, lots, on-street).

STRICTLY ENFORCED: NO SMOKING, NO PARTIES/EVENTS & NO PETS. See RESIDENTIAL RENTAL AGREEMENT under House Rules.

The space
The property is approx. 700sf setup as a true 1br/1ba with private bedroom. Bathroom has large walk-in shower. There is a private balcony with an nice view over Gay Street and of Downtown Columbus skyline. Bedroom has window for natural light and spacious walk-in closet with upgraded shelving system.

License number
2019-1911

name: Sunlit Clintonville ranch home, Long-term rental
description:
This is 4 bedroom, ranch-style home in NW Clintonville that backs up to Whetstone Park. It has new amenities, 2 full bathrooms, an open floor plan, and huge walls of windows that let in amazing light. There is a big back deck and back yard, with a hot tub. There is a 25-foot trail in from the backyard into the park and right onto the bike trail; it is about a 10 minute walk to High St. and local businesses. We are ideally looking for a 3-4 month renter; our dates are somewhat flexible!

The space
We love our home! It is really open feeling, big light, modern without feeling cold. We often all hang on the big living room couch in the evenings or go in the hot tub on the deck and put on the hanging lights out there. The nature around us here is pretty amazing.

Note: these pictures were taken right when we moved in, so it was partially unfurnished (this is why I don't have any pictures of the bedrooms; they only had mattresses in them at the time). We als
neighborhood_overview: Our home is located in a special corner of Clintonville-- the Northwestern section that surrounds the park as well as the rec center, library, tennis courts, playgrounds, etc. It is really quiet, not too many cars, a lot of families, and amazingly beautiful nature. It is sort of the best of all worlds here: we bike to coffee shops and businesses in five minutes, or sometimes walk in 10-15.  We are about ten minute drive north of OSU (or a 25 minute bike ride; the bike trail runs directly behind our home). During this quarantine time though it has been the enormous park behind our house that has been the most remarkable though. We walk back there multiple times a day-- there are many trails, creeks, fields, ravines, the rose garden, etc.
host_about: My partner Luke and I are both college professors and artists. We moved to Columbus a year ago and love this house :)

name: Brand new Premier Downtown Condo - 412
description:
Welcome to our newest Columbus urban environment apartment community.
With eclectic shops, restaurants, and short proximity to Columbus Commons, Harlow is the premier location. Perfect for a weekend away or business travel, this property will not disappoint. Here at Harlow your location is your biggest amenity!
We made a list of the urban hotspots that are steps from your front door!
The Walrus, The Little Palace Restaurant, 16 Bit Bar + Arcade, Mikey’s Late Night Slice, Pecan Penny’s and Hadley’s Bar and Kitchen.
Also, a short distance to Columbus Commons which is a six-acre park set within the scenic Downtown skyline. It is a gathering space for Central Ohio, a backyard for Downtown residents, and an attraction for people of all ages. Events for all ages are happening here throughout the year such as concerts, food truck festivals and more.

name: Minimal 1 bedroom apt Short North
description:
Beautiful historic Victorian building in the Short North filled with plenty of nightlife, restaurants, cafes, and art galleries. There is free WiFi, coin operated laundry, and full kitchen. Parking is on the street. There is NO TV

OSU campus is .9 miles away.
Nationwide Arena is .9 miles away.
Short North is steps away.
German Village is 2 miles away.
Ohio Capital/Statehouse is 1.7 miles away.
COSI Science Center/National Veterans Museum are 2.9 miles away.

The space
This is 1 bedroom apartment with a queen size bed and bathroom. The living room has futon couch, and there is a blow up mattress upon request. Just off the living room is a complete kitchen and the entire unit has 500 mp wifi.....

Guest access
Pay Washer and dryer on 1st floor

Other things to note
PLEASE READ CAREFULLY!!!

Unfortunately because of City of Columbus new parking rules this unit is in a permit
neighborhood_overview: The Short North Arts District is a hip, culture-rich area, this home is located in the heart of it all. You are located just blocks from high street which allows quick easy access to the best nightlife, restaurants, coffee shops, craft beer bars, warehouse converted art galleries and specialty shopping loved by locals. The Short North is where all the action is, the neighborhood sets the bar for all other neighborhoods. It is a short walk to the Columbus Convention Center, Goodale Park, 15 minute drive from the airport, 1 mile to Nationwide Arena, OSU campus, and just minutes to German Village.

This townhouse located in Harrison West/German Village provides 4 finished floors of living space. This includes a finished basement with a large bedroom and a living room, main level with a large family room, kitchen, and half bath, 3 bedrooms on the third floor, and a open concept with 2 bedrooms on the top floor. Private backyard with fire pit and grill, as well as a beautiful shared front porch. PRIVATE PARKING SPACE in the back for at least two cars as well!

name: ★ Lion Safari ★ Private Home with Game Room ★
description:
Located in a developing urban neighborhood near Nationwide Children’s Hospital, this Lion King themed 4-bedroom house is the perfect family getaway. 15% off stays of seven nights or more.

Inside, you’ll find each bedroom has a fully adjustable bed and 55-inch smart TV. Our basement has a game room with arcade cabinets, foosball, and shuffleboard. Outside, our fenced backyard comes with a grill and patio seating.

15 min to the airport, 10 to OSU, and 5 to Nationwide Children’s Hospital.

The space
• Four bedrooms, one and a half bathrooms.
• Smart TVs in the living room, game room, and each bedroom, with access to any of your streaming subscriptions and complementary Hulu TV service.
• Fully equipped kitchen with new stainless steel appliances.
• Office space with computer.
• Gameroom includes arcade cabinets, foosball, and shuffleboard.
• Fenced yard, great for pets.
• Off street parking for one car in the gara
neighborhood_overview: Southern Orchards is a developing urban neighborhood near Nationwide Children’s hospital undergoing rapid redevelopment. It's a diverse area, and its central location makes it easy to get anywhere around Columbus.
host_about:
I’m a moderately geeky real estate investor who prefers to be outdoors and is an avid hiker, fisher, runner and explorer. 

I live in one of my favorite places, Columbus, Ohio.  I provide fun, affordable, high end, safe and memorable vacation homes and event venues in and around the city.  I take pride in my properties and always respond to guests' needs.

I love great food and cocktails and am full of suggestions for fulfilling local experiences.  

I love to travel.  A few of my favorite destinations include Barcelona, Jaipur, Paris, Santorini, Athens, London, and Manhattan Montana.

I love animals.  I own cats and grew up with dogs.   I design my homes to be pet friendly.  I would love to meet your pets.

name: Spacious Modern Condo Heart of Victorian Village 797
description:
This spacious, modern condo-home is located in the heart of the Victorian Village. Victorian Village is one of central Ohio's cores of fine residential architecture. The area is known for its Victorian houses and central location. Easily accessible from the highway and just a block away from North Market and the Columbus Convention Center and its northern boundary, West Fifth Avenue, is half a mile away from The Ohio State University. This beautiful 3 story home has a spacious loft on the 3rd floor for privacy from your other guests. The spacious kitchen comes fully stocked with all that you will need to make and serve a meal for yourself and guests. 

Our customer service hours are from 8am to 10pm. Please reach out to us if you're checking in late, before 10pm that way we can assure a smooth check in.

Victorian Village is consistently ranked a top Columbus neighborhood. It is ranked the ninth most walk-able neighborhood in Columbus with a walk score of ei
neighborhood_overview: Victorian Village is consistently ranked a top Columbus neighborhood. It is ranked the ninth most walkable neighborhood in Columbus with a walk score of eighty-three. Some homes have been split into rented apartments, but many are nationally registered historical landmarks A number of bars and restaurants can be found along the eastern boundary on North High Street. The neighboring neighborhood, The Short North, shares the High Street border with Victorian Village and is known for its entertainment in nightlife and dining among other characteristics. Other bars, restaurants, and sources of entertainment can be found scattered throughout the neighborhood.

name: The Goodale Park Overlook (Suite)
description:
The Goodale Park Overlook is a second floor suite in a fantastic vintage building. Enjoy a panoramic view of Goodale Park from the front balcony. This suite features two bedrooms and one bathroom. Please note that this is a "guest suite" apartment and does not have access to a full kitchen (kitchenette only, as pictured). Street parking is available for $3/night - this area is very popular and it is possible that you may need to park 1-2 blocks away.

null.

host_about:
Hi, we're Kate and Nat!  We live here in the "Short North" neighborhood of Columbus, near the properties that we manage.

We are both graduates of The Ohio State University - Go Bucks!  Kate is a physical therapist and Nat has a background in IT & management consulting.  We love being Airbnb hosts and hearing about all the exciting reasons that people travel to Columbus!

name: The Goodale Park Hideout
description:
The Goodale Park Hideout is a 2 story apartment in a fantastic vintage building. Goodale Park is across the street and the excitement of High Street shopping and dining is just a block away.

The space
This apartment has a unique floor plan. You will enter through the back door of the building and come up the stairs into the kitchen. The living room and "master suite" is here on the second floor, featuring a KING BED, beautiful en suite bathroom, and a huge closet with a decorative fireplace! As you can see in the photos, the third floor is more modest and has not been renovated recently. It has an open loft feel and includes a sitting area and a queen bed at the back of the space, with another full bathroom. Note - the shower is open to the bedroom area. The ceilings are fairly low up here - maybe about 7 feet at the center.

Guest access
You will use a shared entrance with a keypad lock to enter the building. The door opens to a stair

name: Homey place just for you | 1BR in Columbus
description:
Stay for 30+ nights (minimum nights and rates are FIRM) where you’ll have the entire apartment all to yourself at Central Park Apartments. The apartment has beautiful finishes and comes fully outfitted with kitchen, bedroom, & bathroom essentials. Please note, the furnishings & room details WILL VARY as the unit is set up for you upon booking. We are an experienced professional hospitality company that works directly with the property to transform vacant units into your home away from home.

The space
We take the health and safety of guests seriously. Between each stay, the apartment is thoroughly cleaned and sanitized following guidance from the CDC. Cleaners wear protective garments (e.g., mask, gloves) and wipe surfaces, cabinet handles, door knobs, etc. with cleaning solutions that follow CDC guidance. All linens, dishware, glassware and silverware are also washed between stays. Cleaning products and tools are provided so you can clean and sanitize as well.
neighborhood_overview: Welcome to Central Park, the premier location for luxury apartments in the prestigious Worthington neighborhood. Within walking distance to the finest restaurants and minutes from the shopping and entertainment at Polaris, Central Park is perfectly positioned for easy access to a wide range of recreations.

name: Bedroom + 2 sweet cats close to OSU & Short North!
description:
Private 2nd floor ROOM 'C' in eclectic house only 3 blocks from THE Ohio State University & High Street! If you're looking for an affordable room, in a centralized location, close to all the action, then THIS is your spot! Walking distance/short Uber to OSU/Short North/Italian Vill/Victorian Vill/Arena Dist/Downtown/Grandview/Clintonville/Franklinton. Surrounded by bars, restaurants, & nightlife. Room is furnished with full-size air mattress. Extra air mattresses available upon request.

The space
House is unique, eclectic and spacious in the lively South Campus neighborhood located between OSU and Short North. This 2nd floor room has a FULL SIZED bed along with a workspace with desk & chair. On the 2nd floor you have the option of 2 full sized bathrooms as well as laundry.

We do have 2 adorable friendly brother kittens Frank & Fred who will likely greet you as soon as you walk through the door.

Guest access
Feel free to hang out
neighborhood_overview: The South Campus neighborhood is one of the most centralized areas in all of Columbus. Within walking distance to THE Ohio State University campus, Short North, Victorian Village, Italian Village, and Arena District. Short Uber/Lyft to Downtown, Clintonville, Grandview, Franklinton, and Olde Towne East. Surrounded by bars, restaurants, nightlife and everything Columbus has to offer. There is both a Kroger and CVS within walking distance 0.4 miles away.
host_about: Adventurous, tall fella from Ohio.  Lover of music festivals, omelettes and train travel.  I've ventured all over this great country and have had enough experiences for several lifetimes!

name: OSU Retreat 💎 Wifi Workspace, Kitchen, Free PRKG
description:
Our studio retreat has everything you need to relax & enjoy your stay. Off-street parking. 10 min walk to campus buildings! Queen bed, large desk space, 200Mbps WIFI, 32" TV w/Roku, and a well-stocked kitchen to cook your meals. Steps from High St bars, restaurants, and OSU action! Expect noise in the neighborhood. Whether working, resting, or exploring the city, our cozy studio is perfect for you.

Target - 🚶‍♂️7min
Ohio Union - 🚶‍♂️5min
Med Campus - 🚗 4min
ShortNorth/DWTN - 🚗 6min
Airport - 🚗 10min

The space
Our studio is in the heart of OSU student living so you will get some noise from nearby events, especially on weekends. The space is comfortable, convenient, and functional - everything you need to feel at home for a night, or for a month. The kitchen is stocked with essentials for cooking like pots, pans, spatulas, knives, electric stove, microwave, toaster, etc. 32" TV w/Roku (No cable).
Keep your morning routine going
neighborhood_overview: We are located right in the heart of The Ohio State University campus which makes for a great central location throughout Columbus. This neighborhood is thriving with students and young adults - working from their porch, walking to and from High St, lounging on the grass of their front yards, and enjoying all sorts of outdoor activities. A 4 min walk to Newport Music Hall, 5 min walk to South Campus of Ohio State, and a 5 min Uber to Short North/Downtown (Convention Center, Nationwide Arena, Mapfre, Hilton Downtown, etc.). Only a 4 min walk to High St, there are numerous restaurants, bars, breweries, event centers, and places for fun within a short distance of your stay. Please message me for any suggestions!
host_about: Traveling to new places, live music, and the outdoors whether it's hiking, climbing, or biking. Airbnb is just a platform for me to pursue my passion of enabling others to enjoy life-changing experiences. The Tailwind Team and I always have a comfortable space that feels like home for you!

name: Historic Home in the Heart of German Village
description:
This Two bedroom/One bathroom home is an historic getaway located in the heart of German Village.The laid-back German Village is known for charming brick houses built by 19th-century immigrants along Beck, Mohawk, and Deshler streets. Shops selling books, traditional fudge, and handmade jewelry mingle with art galleries, German pubs, American bistros, and artisan coffee shops. In summer, the Actors’ Theatre Columbus stages outdoor Shakespeare and other plays in Schiller Park with its fountains and flower beds. This home is located less than a mile to downtown and the Short North.

✔ 2 Bedrooms & 2 Full Bathrooms + Sleeper Sofa (Sleeps 6!)
✔ Free Garage Parking
✔ Washer & Dryer In Unit

We know you'll love everything this luxury apartment has to offer. Book today while your dates are still available!

The space
Step out from our peaceful, secure apartment building and you'll be a short walk from all the attractions of downtown Columbus!

neighborhood_overview:
Our building is in a hot new neighborhood in downtown Columbus called the River South District. It's artsy, funky, and modern.

Our place is nestled along the river, practically next door to COSI and a stone's throw from Bicentennial Park. You'll love all the art and hand-painted murals.

New breweries, coffee shops, and restaurants are opening up constantly (there are several opening on the first floor of our building right now!).

It's super easy to get anywhere downtown from our place...by car, bicycle, scooter, Uber/Lyft, walking, etc.

When we give people tours of our place, many of them end up saying they'd love to live here. :)
host_about: Hi there! My wife and I are the founders of Epicurean Properties; a small business based in Columbus, OH. name: Housepitality - The Old North Guest House - OSU
description:
The Old North Guest House is a great choice for your visit to Columbus. Enjoy the charm and character in a historic Columbus neighborhood! This half of a double house has 2 bedrooms, 2 full bathrooms, and sleeps up to 6. Enjoy the charm of the hardwood floors, french doors, and a classic lemonade front porch. The best part is the location! Just 5 minutes from OSU, and 10 minutes to downtown Columbus. Our location is a short walk to lots of great restaurants, and bars in Clintonville and OSU !

The space
Our historic home was built in the 1900s! Feel like a part of the history, when you stay in our Old North Guest house. With beautiful restored hardwood floors, and a charming craftsman feel, you can experience a classic Columbus house.

Our first floor has a living room, dinning room, and kitchen. The 2nd floor has 2 bedrooms and 2 full bathrooms! The third floor is not set up, and is off limits.

60Mpbs Hi-speed internet installed.
host_about: I continue to be excited about Airbnb and home-sharing every day! I enjoy hosting guests, I LOVE to travel, and I really love meeting new people. This place creates a downtown city lifestyle as soon as you open the apartment door. It is filled with natural light and has a balcony to allow you to enjoy the fresh city air. This place has a king size floating bed to fulfill the "Outer Space" vibe. There is a spacious bathroom that is stocked with towels, shampoo, conditioner, and Dove body wash. Also, there is a large kitchen that is equipped with pots &pans, Brita, vegetable oil, and salt & pepper.

name: Private Backyard/Patio Home, Heart of Victorian Village
description:
A spacious, modern home with 2 full bedrooms, 1.5 full bathroom, This spacious, modern condo-home is located in the heart of the Victorian Village. Victorian Village is one of central Ohio's cores of fine residential architecture. The area is known for its Victorian houses and central location. Just a block away from North Market and the Columbus Convention Center and its northern boundary, West Fifth Avenue, is half a mile away from The Ohio State University.

Our customer service hours are from 8am to 10pm. Please reach out to us if you're checkin in late before 10pm that way we can assure a smooth check in.

Victorian Village is consistently ranked a top Columbus neighborhood. It is ranked the ninth most walkable neighborhood in Columbus with a walk score of eighty-three. Some homes have been split into rented apartments, but many are nationally registered historical landmarks
A number of bars and restaurants can be found along the eastern boundary
host_about:
Hello everyone! I am very excited to be apart of this wonderful community and make all my guests feel right at home. 

You can expect very fast communication and a response to any and all questions or concerns within minutes! 

Born and raised in Columbus, Oh. 

I LOVE to travel with my Wife and explore other great Airbnbs. Whether that's on the beach, lake or in the city! 

I look forward to connecting with people from all over the world as a host and traveler!

name: Rest a while
description:
Hi and thanks for checking out our space! Katie and I (William) have a beautiful home built in 1900 that is located directly across from the historic Ohio Dominican University. We have two Private bedrooms available for short term or long term visits. Conveniently located minutes from the airport and within very easy access to i670/i270. Also a short drive/ride to downtown Columbus and the Short North. We have a minimum stay of 30 days and are open to extended stays after your initial booking!

The space
By booking with us you will have a private room (12x12) with a king sized bed and access to our WiFi. You will share a common bath located on the same floor and will also have access to the kitchen for filtered water, coffee and to store leftovers from dining out. We will also allow you to share the common dining room as well as have access to the laundry room.
host_about: I am a working professional currently at Abbott Nutrition. Columbus Ohio is home and I am a huge Ohio State fan! I love to travel and go on outdoor adventures around the world. As much as I enjoy to be active, being comfortable at home or while away is a top priority for me. I am also always excited to meet new friends!

Chic modern condo w/balcony in heart of Downtown Columbus steps from pubs, cafes, Capitol Square, Arena District & riverfront. Wood flooring (no carpet), granite kitchen. name: Bright + Modern 1BR in Downtown
description:
COVID-19 PRECAUTIONS
Nothing is more important to us than the health and safety of our communities. We are monitoring the situation very closely, and we would like to share the additional precautions that have been recently added. All amenities at this property have been closed. We have increased our cleaning standards, specifically as it relates to cleaning and disinfecting surfaces. This is all very necessary for the safety of guests, and we must do our part to keep this community safe.

The space
STAYING LONG TERM? Contact us for up to 25% off your stay!

We have a zero-tolerance policy for parties or gatherings. We use a noise sensor to detect the noise level inside the suite, a people counter which counts the number of people nearby, in addition to numerous neighbors who are understandably more sensitive during this time. The guest amount on your reservation must match the number of guests that will be inside the suite at any given time. We do
neighborhood_overview: Our suite is nestled right in the heart of Downtown Columbus’ River South District. This recently-transformed neighborhood has quickly gone from a long-forgotten area to a vibrant urban destination with a burgeoning nightlife and arts scene. River South is home to some of the best bars, restaurants, and coffee shops that Columbus has to offer. Take in some fresh air in this river-side neighborhood and go for a walk along the Scioto Greenway and through Bicentennial Park.
host_about: Frontdesk offers trusted travelers exactly the stay they want - their kind of place, in their kind of neighborhood.

name: Urban 3BD Apt. Near Children's, Downtown, & OTE
description:
Enjoy your stay at a newly renovated urban, 3 BD/1 Bath apt with thoughtful details and a focus on comfort located in an up-and-coming, diverse neighborhood. Located just 3 blocks from Nationwide Children's Hospital, you'll be minutes from all that Downtown has to offer. Although you are within walking distance to new restaurants, breweries, and coffee shops; this neighborhood is going through a revitalization period and is considered transitional. Absolutely no smoking allowed on the property

The space
Don't be intimidated by the lack-luster appearance of the outside (we're scheduled for new siding in the spring...) Self-check in using the keypad on the front door and find a cozy living space, table seating for 4, and an updated kitchen stocked with the essentials (including water and coffee!). Sign-in to your streaming services on the provided amazon firestick to watch your favorite shows or utilize our small selection of board games to keep yourself enterta
neighborhood_overview: The apartment is located in Southern Orchards; a small, transitional neighborhood located next to German Village and Olde Town East.  Nationwide Children's Hospital (3 blocks away) has played an integral part in the revitalization of the neighborhood.  Although a lot of work has been done to update the neighborhood, there are a few owners that have chosen to wait for higher sales prices before selling, and have boarded their investment until they decide to sell.  You will see kids riding their bikes and young families walking their dogs. You may also see a driver speeding down the street or playing their music too loudly.
host_about: Hello, my name is Annie! My husband and I are the owners of Columbus Accent Homes! We live in Columbus with our two dogs. We love hosting in Columbus, but we also love to travel and always try to stay in Airbnbs so we get a better feel for the local scene. Interested in hosting your space in Columbus on Airbnb?  Send me a message; I'd love to help!

name: German Village Home 2
description:
Huge historical home that can comfortably accommodate a large group or family. Home has 4 queen sized beds, sofa couch. First floor bedroom and bathroom. 10 foot ceilings with original stained woodwork. Perfect location located in German Village, a popular area of Columbus. Close to all popular locations and only a 10 minute drive to The Ohio State University! 5 minute drive to Nationwide Children's Hospital.

License number
2019-1354
host_about:
We are childhood friends and business partners.
We are originally from Canton, Ohio and now reside in the Cleveland area. We both graduated from The Ohio State University and started hosting on Airbnb in 2013. We started Cleveland House Hotels, which is a short term vacation property company in 2015.  We have a full time cleaning staff and maintenance person on hand to take care of any issues.  We also have our reservations specialist, Deanna who will be the one responding to your requests.

Niko (Nick) has been in the hospitality business for many years, having worked in hotels and restaurants.  He owns a small diner in Old Brooklyn called Gus's Family Restaurant.  He is married and has two children.  In addition to cooking and owning a restaurant, Niko is the co-founder and COO of Cleveland House Hotels.  

Billy is a co-founder and CEO of Cleveland House Hotels.  Billy is a successful real estate investor and has been in the sales business for over 15 years.  He loves traveling and spending time with his son, William.

name: Homey place just for you | 2BR in Columbus
description:
Stay for 30+ nights (minimum nights and rates are FIRM) where you’ll have the entire apartment all to yourself at Central Park Apartments. The apartment has beautiful finishes and comes fully outfitted with kitchen, bedroom, & bathroom essentials. Please note, the furnishings & room details WILL VARY as the unit is set up for you upon booking. We are an experienced professional hospitality company that works directly with the property to transform vacant units into your home away from home.

The space
We take the health and safety of guests seriously. Between each stay, the apartment is thoroughly cleaned and sanitized following guidance from the CDC. Cleaners wear protective garments (e.g., mask, gloves) and wipe surfaces, cabinet handles, door knobs, etc. with cleaning solutions that follow CDC guidance. All linens, dishware, glassware and silverware are also washed between stays. Cleaning products and tools are provided so you can clean and sanitize as well.
neighborhood_overview: Welcome to Central Park, the premier location for luxury apartments in the prestigious Worthington neighborhood. Within walking distance to the finest restaurants and minutes from the shopping and entertainment at Polaris, Central Park is perfectly positioned for easy access to a wide range of recreations.

name: The Goodale Park Overlook
description:
The Goodale Park Overlook is a large 2-story apartment in a fantastic vintage brick duplex house. Large windows, hardwood floors, high ceilings, and custom touches will make this a unique and memorable stay! Enjoy a panoramic view of Goodale Park from the front balcony or walk 5 minutes to High Street shopping and dining. Plenty of room for larger groups with 4 bedrooms, 3 full bathrooms, and 3 separate living room areas.

Street parking is available for $3/night.

The space
The Airbnb spans the entire second and third floors of the building. You will enter through the front door and come straight up the stairs to the second floor. This leads to the front living room (with the balcony) and the first bedroom with a queen bed. Moving down the hallway, you will find the second bedroom with two twin beds, and a hallway bathroom. At the other end of the first floor, there is a second living room area, the "master" bedroom, and the kitchen. The master bed
host_about:
Hi, we're Kate and Nat!  We live here in the "Short North" neighborhood of Columbus, near the properties that we manage.

We are both graduates of The Ohio State University - Go Bucks!  Kate is a physical therapist and Nat has a background in IT & management consulting.  We love being Airbnb hosts and hearing about all the exciting reasons that people travel to Columbus!

name: Whole House German Village - Frankfort
description:
Huge historical home that can comfortable accommodate large groups or families. Home has 8 queen sized beds , 10 foot ceilings and is all original stained woodwork.

Perfect location located in German Village, a popular area of Columbus. Close to all popular locations. Only 10 minute drive to The Ohio State University and only a 5 minute drive to Nationwide Children's Hospital. Modern and trendy decor. Near many shops and restaurants.

Absolutely no parties, loud music, or being loud outdoors. The owner lives next door and has been known to ask guests to leave without giving warnings when these things have happened in the past. We want to make sure to keep all of our guests and neighbors happy so please be courteous. The house is equipped with sound monitors in order to prevent loud or large gatherings. We appreciate your cooperation with keeping the neighborhood quiet.

host_about:
We are childhood friends and business partners.
We are originally from Canton, Ohio and now reside in the Cleveland area. We both graduated from The Ohio State University and started hosting on Airbnb in 2013. We started Cleveland House Hotels, which is a short term vacation property company in 2015.  We have a full time cleaning staff and maintenance person on hand to take care of any issues.  We also have our reservations specialist, Deanna who will be the one responding to your requests.

Niko (Nick) has been in the hospitality business for many years, having worked in hotels and restaurants.  He owns a small diner in Old Brooklyn called Gus's Family Restaurant.  He is married and has two children.  In addition to cooking and owning a restaurant, Niko is the co-founder and COO of Cleveland House Hotels.  

Billy is a co-founder and CEO of Cleveland House Hotels.  Billy is a successful real estate investor and has been in the sales business for over 15 years.  He loves traveling and spending time with his son, William.

name: Clintonville Charmer | Walk to Great Restaurants!
description:
Be our guest at this charming Clintonville home, located on a quiet street in a safe neighborhood - and just a 4-minute walk from the fabulous Northstar Cafe on High Street!

This comfortable single-family home has two first-floor bedrooms and a welcoming open kitchen/dining/living space for gathering. Walk to the Columbus Park of Roses or Whetstone High School in about 10 minutes. Drive to Riverside Hospital in 7 minutes, or make it downtown or to the airport in just 15 minutes!

The space
You'll park in the private driveway and enter through the back door of the home, into the living room area. This is a "great room" which features gleaming hardwood floors, open living space with a TV, a dining table for four, and an open kitchen with two stools at the counter.

The first floor has two bedrooms, each with a queen bed, and one hallway bathroom which features a wide doorway and an accessible roll-in shower. One bedroom is in the "front room"
neighborhood_overview:
Not kidding here: Clintonville was recently named the "Nicest Place in Ohio" by Reader's Digest. Here's a short excerpt from the article:

The Clintonville neighborhood in Columbus, Ohio is an older area of the city filled with a wealth of houses built in the early 1900’s, stately old trees, parks, shops, restaurants and possibly the highest density of Toyota Priuses per capita of anywhere you’ll find. The sense of community is really impressive here and our neighborhood recently gained national attention when two young aspiring musicians put on a porch recital for their 78 year old neighbor Helena Schlam while she was sheltering in place at home.
host_about:
Hi, we're Kate and Nat!  We live here in the "Short North" neighborhood of Columbus, near the properties that we manage.

We are both graduates of The Ohio State University - Go Bucks!  Kate is a physical therapist and Nat has a background in IT & management consulting.  We love being Airbnb hosts and hearing about all the exciting reasons that people travel to Columbus!

name: Bexley Mid-Mod Masterpiece near Downtown & Airport
description:
Mid-century modern masterpiece in Central Bexley steps to churches, synagogues & dining, and 5-10 mins drive to airport or Downtown Columbus! Perfect for families. 3BR/2BA all on 1 level, plus finished basement w/den & bonus bedroom. Beautifully furnished & decorated! New paint, flooring, carpet. Sunny open floor plan. Fully-equipped kitchen & spacious dining. Home office space. Lovely deck & landscaping. 1 covered + up to 3 more off-street parking spots. High-speed internet & DirecTV. W/D.

The space
This is a classic mid-century modern house (originally built 1956) with authentic architectural details including central decorative fireplace. Ranch floor plan with 3 bedrooms and 2 full baths all on main level. Lovely open staircase to finished basement with 2 more rooms (den and bonus guest bedroom). Rear deck with outdoor dining for 6 & gas grill! Great front porch, classic side-load carport out front, and generous driveway with parking for up to 4 vehicles total
neighborhood_overview: Bexley is an old-line suburb just 4-5 miles due east of Downtown Columbus. It has classic homes mostly built from the 1920s-1950s. There are churches, schools, and commercial retail nearby. This house is on S Gould Rd, on the City of Columbus side (east) of the street, so while it is, for all intents and purposes, in Central Bexley, it is in Columbus City Schools. This is disclosed for the purpose of any long term guest with school-age children needing to attend public schools.
host_about:
I'm a professional photographer splitting my time between Columbus, Manhattan, and Barcelona. My wife and I travel all over the country and world, now with our two little boys. We're Superhosts ourselves, which make us very courteous guests and will always leave your place tidy upon our departure, just as we’d hope you’d treat our home.  

Check out our listings if you’re interested in staying at one of our properties in Columbus. From a stunning 3 bedroom Mid-century modern home in Bexley to turn of the century historic brick homes in the heart of German Village. You're covered on your next trip to Columbus whether looking for a weekend retreat, a relaxing place to call home during a business trip, attending a convention, a wedding, or in need of longer-term accommodations for your medical residency or stint as a professor at OSU!
We look forward to hosting you!

neighborhood_overview:
The neighborhood is safe and charming. I have owned the house for many years. There are many things to see (and eat) in the neighborhood!

If you are looking for food:

The world famous, Schmidt's Sausage Haus and Restaurant is a short 8min walk. Has all types of authentic German sausages, pretzels and pastries.

I also recommend Barcelona Restaurant & Bar, it has phenomenal ambiance and features traditionally Spanish cuisine.

The Brown Bag is located closeby on Whittier, awesome breakfast and lunch fare.

For spirited drinks and beers, here are my neighborhood favorites:

- Antiques on High - phenomenal atmosphere, sour beers and cocktails.

- Law Bird - great little wine and cocktail spot, also on High St.

name: Majestic Mohawk II • German Village • Nationwide
description:
Located in the heart of historic German Village, this charming home has a beautiful outdoor patio and garden, eat-in kitchen, king bedroom, 2 living rooms w/pull out sofa beds, Smart TVs, W/D, and Wi-Fi. Just 2 blocks from beautiful Schiller Park & a stone's throw from German Village's incredible restaurants, bars, & coffee shops, you're 1/4 mile from downtown, 1 mile from Short North & near Arena, Convention Center & OSU Campus.

The space
2-story layout has twin living rooms and kitchen on main level with main bedroom upstairs, including a desk office space. Both living rooms have pull-out sofas. The screened-in private deck that is accessible from the back door and from a shared backyard garden.

Guest access
Guests will have access to the entire home, which is half of a double. A private screened-in porch, and a shared backyard patio.

License number
20211038
neighborhood_overview: German Village is memorable for a thousand reasons, all of which are intimately personal to the individuals fortunate to reside in or visit the neighborhood. The sense of community is palpable, the historic architecture is beautiful, and the history is visible. German Village is not easily forgotten. From walkability to a great sense of community, German Village is an incredible place to be. You feel it when you cross through the Third Street gateway or explore the parks. Millions of individual bricks were placed on top of one another to form this Village.
host_about:
I'm a professional photographer splitting my time between Columbus, Manhattan, and Barcelona. My wife and I travel all over the country and world, now with our two little boys. We're Superhosts ourselves, which make us very courteous guests and will always leave your place tidy upon our departure, just as we’d hope you’d treat our home.  

Check out our listings if you’re interested in staying at one of our properties in Columbus. From a stunning 3 bedroom Mid-century modern home in Bexley to turn of the century historic brick homes in the heart of German Village. You're covered on your next trip to Columbus whether looking for a weekend retreat, a relaxing place to call home during a business trip, attending a convention, a wedding, or in need of longer-term accommodations for your medical residency or stint as a professor at OSU!
We look forward to hosting you!

name: Private Chic Home - Downtown Columbus
description:
Whether you're on a business trip, are temporarily relocating, or just taking a long vacation, you've found your home away from home. Our large two bedroom, one bath duplex unit is located in a quaint Downtown Columbus neighborhood, Olde Towne East. Walking distance or a quick Uber ride to many restaurants, bars, shops, and entertainment, we are accessible to it all. Work from home or at one of our partner coworking spaces nearby. Need concierge services? Personal assistants are a call away.

The space
Our modern unit was designed with business travelers in mind. The oversized main bedroom includes a King bed, double-entry closet, and an open-floor-plan office. The second room can be transformed into a reading room, yoga/fitness studio, or a full-size bedroom if needed. Get some fresh air in the private backyard, perfect for alone time or entertaining. Street parking in the front is available. The unit is fully equipped with a washer/dryer, fridge, microwave, oven
neighborhood_overview: Olde Towne East is a neighborhood located in the historical Near East Side of Columbus, Ohio and is one of Columbus' oldest neighborhoods. One block away you will find a few local hang-outs and eateries to include Yellowbrick Pizza, Olde Towne Tavern, Lifestyle Cafe (Vegan), Camelot Cellars (Winery) and Our Bar & Lounge. A few blocks further you will find my daily coffee shop, Upper Cup Coffee; a breakfast favorite, Hangover Easy; brunch and cocktails at The Olde Oak and the perfect patio at Germut Biergarten. All in walking distance! There are also a handful of great shops, gardens and parks in the area.

name: Little Blue 1 Bed, 1 Bath Studio - RoweRentals
description:
‘Little Blue’ is a 1 bedroom, 1 bath studio located in the beautiful Italian Village, Short North, Columbus. This 2nd floor carriage house apartment is located in the rear of a custom home vacation rental that we endearingly call ‘Big Blue’. The 375 Sq Ft apartment, with a private entrance, is the perfect space for a quiet getaway. The studio consists of a living room area, dining/desk area, kitchen, and bathroom area. Experience this super cozy dwelling nestled in the prime Short North!

The space
The kitchen comes equipped with basic necessities to cook a decent meal (electric 2 top burner, microwave, air fryer, pots, pans, plates, glassware etc.) and has some basic cooking staples (olive oil, salt and pepper, sugar, coffee, tea, etc.). We provide a Mr. Coffee machine and Folders coffee too.

Open living space with living room, Kitchen and dining or desk area. The living room has comfortable seating and a smart TV (no cable service).

The b
neighborhood_overview:
The Short North Arts District is one of the Midwest’s best kept secrets. There is a huge variety of unique shops, bars and restaurants, and art galleries along High Street and a number of annual events that take place year-round. We have a thorough list of recommendations in the house to local bakeries, cafes, and restaurants.

The Short North is made up of several historic neighborhoods; this home is located in Weinland Park, a cool, urban area on the East side of High St above 5th Ave. Weinland Park still has its edgy, up-and-coming vibe- there is a lot of construction and development still underway, real estate is hot here despite its sometimes worn look. You will see a lot of renovated homes as well as ones not-yet-touched. This is not a cookie-cutter neighborhood; it's an historic, city neighborhood. The neighborhood is home to a mix of young professionals and families and close to an elementary school. This apartment is in walking distance to High Street and N. 4th St
host_about:
We met in Japan, moved to Columbus in (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) , and have been loving it ever since! We are both experienced travelers (25+ countries on 5 continents between us) & are passionate about renovating historic homes and building new homes. Check out our (Hidden by Airbnb) s at @RoweRentals and @RoweHouseCbus.

We love being hosts- providing a comfortable home to travelers who are visiting our gem of a city- 'Cbus'! We know quite a lot about Short North entertainment & restaurants- there is so much to do here, feel free to ask!
- Ingrid, Mike, and Frances, Co-Host 

Our life motto- Live like someone left the gate open!

name: Historic, Industrial Loft in Brewery District
description:
This loft is located in the Brewery District—one of the most sought after neighborhoods to live, work, and play in Columbus. It is the perfect balance of old and new as it features century-old details like exposed timber beams and all the modern, high-end amenities you’d expect to find in your dream home such as hardwood floors, granite countertops, and stainless steel appliances. It also has a washer & dryer, a fitness center, on-site parking, and several nearby parks, bars, and restaurants.

The space
Modern amenities meet historic charm in this newly renovated, well-designed loft. Enjoy 15' ceilings and 12' windows, which add natural light and volume to this open layout, exquisite furniture, and hand-made artwork by yours truly. Right outside your front door, you'll find coffee shops, breweries, theatres, and fine dining. It's a destination sure to please all of your senses.

Amenities include: gated community, guest intercom entry, granite countertop
neighborhood_overview: Originally built by German settlers, the Brewery District was an industrial hub of the city’s historic beer scene, and is now full of lively entertainment and dining options like gastropubs, tapas spots, and farm-to-table restaurants. For entertainment, head to Shadowbox Live, the country’s largest resident theater company, presenting original productions complete with live music nearly every day of the week.
host_about:
I’m originally from Johnstown, PA—a former steel town located in the Laurel Mountains—but I’ve called Columbus, OH home for the last decade! Needless to say, I know the area well. 

I’ve been a part of the Airbnb community since January 2014, and since then, I’ve welcomed 700+ guests from 16 different countries and earned the highly proclaimed title of “Superhost”. My goal has never wavered; to provide an exceptional experience for each one of my valued guests. 

I take my work seriously, but not myself. I’m an actuary by profession, a private pilot just for fun, and a lover of good food and adventure!

name: Quaint 1 Bedroom, Furnish Apt. Near OSU
description:
Your apt is in the upper level of my Victorian home. Fully furnished bedroom, full kitchen and bath. Wifi, central AC/heat & utilities included. Shares hall w/ house, but entirely private. 2 entrances: back entrance (temporarily unavailable, ready in spring);front entrance, separate from my apt. downstairs.Off-street parking w/extra space, W/D available, .5 mi to OSU, Short North, Convention Center, Arena district;1 mi to downtown;2 mi to hospitals. 30 day min./perfect for traveling professional

The space
My home is on a quiet street in a lovely historic district (Victorian Village) close to everything. Your apartment is quaint, and though entirely private, shares a hall with two other bedrooms and a family room used by my children when they visit. You are welcome to share our common spaces as much as like, including the yard/garden. In the spring and summer, our backyard is beautiful with blooming magnolias, flowers, and vegetables (which we'll share too!).
neighborhood_overview: Victorian Village is a beautiful, historic area of Columbus.  The houses were built around 1870-1890.  There are cafes, restaurants, shops, stores and Ohio State campus all nearby and within walking distance.  There are also gyms, salons, and Goodale park (a large, beautiful park with a pond, flowers and trees, tennis courts, playground, and lots of green space where people take their dogs to socialize and play).  If you enjoy hiking/nature, Columbus offers several Metroparks/nature reserves with hiking paths, picnic areas, nature hikes and related activities all within a 20 minute drive from my house. I'm a native of Columbus and have lived in this area since 2006 and really love it!
host_about: Hi! I'm Concetta! I love to travel, meet people and learn new languages!

name: Historic Manor in the Heart of Columbus
description:
Where industrial meets cozy, this space is designed to help you feel at home, kick back and relax while providing options for in home entertainment for those hours or nights you'd rather stay in. A slate pool table and fooseball table as well a 75" TV and sound system will be there to entertain you during your stay.

The space
The space is located in the basement of a late 1800's Victorian manor. It has been totally renovated in early 2020. The main area is about 33ft by 20 ft so its quite large and open. I dug out the basement to give it 9 ft ceilings. You will have your own entrance that is entirely separate from my living space. Washer and dryer is on site for your convenience as well.

If you want a beautiful space in the best neighborhood in Columbus where you get the opportunity to interact with your host (like old time Airbnb experiences) this is the space for you.

neighborhood_overview: German Village is memorable for a thousand reasons, all of which are intimately personal to the individuals fortunate to reside in or visit the neighborhood. The sense of community is palpable, the historic architecture is beautiful, and the history is visible. German Village is not easily forgotten. From walkability to a great sense of community, German Village is an incredible place to be. You feel it when you cross through the Third Street gateway or explore the parks. Millions of individual bricks were placed on top of one another to form this Village.
host_about:

Check out our listings if you’re interested in staying at one of our properties in Columbus. From a stunning 3 bedroom Mid-century modern home in Bexley to turn of the century historic brick homes in the heart of German Village. You're covered on your next trip to Columbus whether looking for a weekend retreat, a relaxing place to call home during a business trip, attending a convention, a wedding, or in need of longer-term accommodations for your medical residency or stint as a professor at OSU!
We look forward to hosting you!

host_about:
I’m a moderately geeky real estate investor who prefers to be outdoors and is an avid hiker, fisher, runner and explorer. 

I live in one of my favorite places, Columbus, Ohio.  I provide fun, affordable, high end, safe and memorable vacation homes and event venues in and around the city.  I take pride in my properties and always respond to guests' needs.

I love great food and cocktails and am full of suggestions for fulfilling local experiences.

Newly renovated duplex unit in Olde Town East next to Nationwide Children's Hospital. Memory foam mattress & pillows, double pane windows, central A/C, ceiling fans for ultimate comfort. Granite kitchen countertop & premium built in stainless steel appliances, bathroom tile flooring/walls & modern vanities, front load washer/dryer for style. Furniture made with solid wood & leather. Conveniently located near Downtown & German Village. Close to freeways & short distance from markets/restaurants.

The space
This listing is for the entire house with the north bedroom. The bedroom comes with euro styled Queen bedroom furnishing with new ceiling fan and Nectar memory foam mattress and pillows.

neighborhood_overview: Close to Downtown Columbus, and not far from Ohio State University.  Within walking distance to Nationwide Children’s Hospital. Our neighborhood is going through a major revitalization and is quickly becoming the cool place to be. Infrastructure improvements such as water/gas lines, new block pave streets and home renovations are a common sight in our neighborhood.
host_about: We live in Silicon Valley in California.  This house is our home away from home in Columbus and it has been newly furnished with tender and care in every details just like we would want to live ourselves.  We welcome you to enjoy it whether it is for business trip or for leisure family vacation.  We hope it will bring you much comfort and satisfaction and return as often as you wish.

name: Jungle Book 1bd 🌿 Live Plants, Desk, WIFI, Parking
description:
Feel at home in the Jungle Book 1bd with a spacious workspace, high-speed WiFi, queen memory foam mattress, & well-stocked kitchen. Centrally located near popular food joints, river trail parks, & city attractions.

Our top priority is your safety. We wear masks & gloves, and follow extensive checklists as a part of Airbnb's enhanced cleaning protocol.

Located in the eclectic Old North neighborhood. Close to Clinton-Como and Tuttle Park, 1 min from Ohio State campus, and right off of High St.

The space
The live plants brighten this space and make you feel at home. With a comfortable queen bed, updated bathroom, spacious work desk, living room with a pullout sofa, and kitchen with an array of coffee & tea options - Jungle Book is the perfect space for your Columbus stay. While the dining area is small, it makes up for it with its location right off High St and the comfortable living area. Rent bird/lime scooters and explore the city, or take a
neighborhood_overview: Located in the Old North neighborhood of Columbus, this is just north of Ohio State campus and south of Clintonville. Located 2 min from Clinton-Como and Tuttle Park, grab a bird/lime scooter or bike and hop on the bike path and explore the city. You can take the bike path all the way to down town which is about 5 miles. You also are located right off High St where there are restaurants, bars, fast food, and grocery stores. Perfect for any short or long term stay.
host_about: Providing guests with the best experience possible here in Columbus, Ohio! description:
Renovated historic brick townhouse located just outside of German Village. Walking distance to the Thurman Cafe, Plank's Cafe & Pizzeria, Parsons North brewing, among many more restaurants, bars, and cafes. Just recently remodeled, the home boasts many attractive features like stainless steel appliances, hardwood floors, and a lovely relaxing bathroom with a vintage clawfoot tub! If you're in town for the night life, looking for some great food, or just a get away this is the perfect location.

The space
Film lovers will relish in our cinema themed living room, which even includes a complimentary popcorn machine. The spacious living area has a comfortable sleeper sectional that quickly and easily converts into a spacious bed when you remove the back cushions and pull out the underframe.

description:

The space
Welcome to The Director's Cut (Entire Home), our Themed BNB!  

Upon entry, you walk directly onto the DIRECTOR'S CUT (Living Room).  See what is NOW SHOWING at any time of day.  

Through the corridor, our COMEDY KITCHEN features Happy Chef Dishware and much more!  

JAMES DEAN brings you back to the old country western times (1st Full Bathroom).

Up the stairs you will find:
▪︎"A Tribute to Marilyn Monroe" (Queen bedroom - Right)
▪︎"Bad Boys" (King bedroom

Being within walking, skipping, scootering, riding, hovering, LYFTing distance from most places makes it easy to go vehicle-less. 

Having #NationwideChildrensHospital ONLY 2 blocks away makes this AIRBNB ideal for traveling #Nurses , #Doctors , #Patients & Family Visitors.

name: LUXURY RETREAT INSIDE THE HEART OF GERMAN VILLAGE
description:
Luxury retreat inside the heart of German Village. Have the same advantages of being close to downtown without any of the headaches. Gated off-street parking for 2 cars parked tandem. Dacor range oven, commercial-grade kitchen tools, sub-zero fridge, handcrafted custom furniture, 4k Samsung tv, printer, cable, wifi, 2 full bathrooms & spacious backyard. It's a place certainly like no other in Columbus.

The space
2 bedrooms, 2 full baths. 1 king on the second floor and 2 queens on the 3rd floor. Spacious backyard with fire pits seating for 5 and an outdoor grill, koi pond (please do not feed them :)), custom 1 of 1 table in every room, exterior security cameras with an alarm system, 75 in 4k sony tv with surround sound speakers, office with a printer, gated off-street parking.

**Please note there is an extra bedroom in the house that is the homeowners that will be locked and will not have access too as they will be keeping personal belongings inside; h
neighborhood_overview: The quite friendly historic neighborhood, a short walk to Schiller Park for some fresh air, Stauffs coffee is 2 turns to get to by car same with Starbucks drive-through, Barcelona and Lindy's Restaurants are one of the best restaurants in the city and not far from this location. Ubers are readily available. 30 minutes from Easton or Dublin. 15-minute uber ride to the short north restaurants and nightlife. Charming original brick roads, historic buildings, and small boutique shops nearby.
host_about: Hosting Luxury Properties right near you. We care nothing but a 5 Star Experience and we will make sure to guarantee that.

name: Elegant Historic 2 BR Duplex in Olde Town East
description:
Historic Olde Town East 2BR, 1.5 bath duplex a short walk from Franklin Park Conservatory and (coming in June 2021) the Trolly Barn District. Easy commute to Nationwide Children's Hospital and downtown. High ceilings, wood floors, exposed brick walls, 2 large bedrooms, 1 spacious full bathroom with a clawfoot tub and shower and a dressing table and a half bath on the 1st floor. Open and elegantly-appointed living & dining areas, granite kitchen with stainless steel appliances &cooking basics.

The space
The space is artsy but not pretentious with a clean, uncluttered look. Yet it has all the comforts of home -- beds with mattress toppers and comforters, stools for hanging out in the kitchen while cooking, board games galore, washer/dryer to get your duds washed, outdoor furniture on the back patio and front porch to watch the neighbors out walking their dogs, beautiful flowers in the summer. Just a wonderful homelike place to relax after a long day!
neighborhood_overview: Olde Town East is a wonderfully gentrifying area that used to be THE well-heeled address in 1910 Columbus. It is a fascinatingl place to walk with historic homes and mansions at every turn. This is a racially diverse and extremely friendly neighborhood where people say hello and dog walkers abound. Franklin Park Conservatory is 4 blocks away and is a top tourist site in Columbus. Sit on the front porch and watch the world go by!
host_about: I am a fun-loving, travel-loving woman who enjoys history, reading, hiking, camping and hosting my Airbnb guests.

name: Bright + Updated House ✨ Big Ktchn✨ German Village
description:
We welcome you to our beautiful two bedroom, one bath home located in the thriving Merion Village - steps from the best restaurants & parks! Stay in and enjoy a home-cooked meal in our full & upgraded kitchen. Grab the Roku remote and relax in the spacious living room. Take a walk through historic German Village and try Columbus' highest rated burger at Thurman's Cafe! Whether you are working from home, exploring the city, or celebrating a someone special, our home will make for a perfect stay!

The space
Situated just far enough away from High St and Downtown for peace & quiet, but close enough that you could walk to some of the best bars & restaurants in town! Our updated carriage house features beautiful hardwood floors and modern furnishings throughout.

This carriage house is located in the alley behind another home. It can be difficult to find in the dark, but we have a check-in guide with pictures and are always available to help!

High-
neighborhood_overview: This house is tucked away in the historic & thriving Merion Village - a lively and inviting neighborhood with an amazing LGBTQ community! You''ll find revived and updated 1900s carriage houses, original brick accents, and a bright young community just a short walk from High St and German Village! Discover a brewery, a burger joint, a popular cafe, and the most beautiful park in Columbus if you take a short walk north up Jaeger St.

Experience Columbus' true character in our updated 2-bedroom penthouse loft across from Schiller Park & German Village - on the top floor of the historic 1800s Carriage House. Location doesn't get any better than this! Walking distance to literally everything German Village has to offer, including our best parks, restaurants, & bars! 5min to downtown! Expect some noise (busy street). Free parking!

Our top priority is your safety. We wear masks & gloves, and follow extensive cleaning checklists.

This bright + open space invites you to explore Columbus' most charming and lively community situated between German Village and the Brewery District.

name: Cozy New 3BR Short North Townhouse, Very Walkable!
description:
New Renovation! Newly renovated townhouse 5 minutes to Short North and 3 minutes to Italian Villiage. Walking distance to tons to cool bars, Restaurants, Breweries, and shops. This house is on a quiet street with plenty of parking. Only 6 minutes to downtown, 5 minutes to The Ohio State University, and 2 blocks from a great park. Pet Friendly!

The space
There are 3 bedrooms, 1 full bathroom, plenty of common space, and a large backyard. All new furnishings and memory foam mattresses throughout! Brand new central air for the whole home. Parking for 1-2 cars in the back depending on size. There is plenty of free street parking out front as well. Keypad locks, large dining, and living rooms, and plenty of seating. Perfect for all groups!

Guest access
You'll have access to the whole home!

License number
2019-7489
neighborhood_overview: Weiland Park, which runs along Summit and 4th Street south of The Ohio State University and North of downtown Columbus, Short North, and Italian Villiage, is one of central Ohio’s cores of fine residential architecture. This neighborhood is directly North East of the well known Short North area of Columbus. Some of the most celebrated spots to eat and drink in Columbus are in the Short North Arts District, which is gaining recognition as a dining destination. This portion of High Street is filled with boutiques, art galleries, coffee houses, restaurants, and bars.

name: The Gallerie Loft | German Village | Nationwide
description:
Located in the heart of German Village, this super unique, mini studio loft has top finishes, stainless steel appliances, vaulted ceilings, and is a minute's walk to beautiful Schiller Park, the best eateries, coffeeshops and shopping that German Village has to offer. It’s one mile from downtown, a quick Uber drive from the Short North, Convention Center, Arena District and CMH airport. This loft is perfect for a single guest or a couple visiting our historic neighborhood! *NO PARTIES*"

The space
The space is a converted carriage house loft above in the back of my property. The bathroom is beautifully renovated with natural marble tile and a custom glass shower, but is VERY small due to the nature of the space. So, if you're a particularly large and/or tall person, or have claustrophobia, please consider one of my other listings on the property that are full-sized. Just send me a note!

Mega-listing! If you're planning an event, like a wedding, I have
neighborhood_overview: German Village is memorable for a thousand reasons, all of which are intimately personal to the individuals fortunate to reside in or visit the neighborhood. The sense of community is palpable, the historic architecture is beautiful, and the history is visible. German Village is not easily forgotten. From walkability to a great sense of community, German Village is an incredible place to be. You feel it when you cross through the Third Street gateway or explore the parks. Millions of individual bricks were placed on top of one another to form this Village.
host_about:
I'm a professional photographer splitting my time between Columbus, Manhattan, and Barcelona. My wife and I travel all over the country and world, now with our two little boys. We're Superhosts ourselves, which make us very courteous guests and will always leave your place tidy upon our departure, just as we’d hope you’d treat our home.  

Check out our listings if you’re interested in staying at one of our properties in Columbus. From a stunning 3 bedroom Mid-century modern home in Bexley to turn of the century historic brick homes in the heart of German Village. You're covered on your next trip to Columbus whether looking for a weekend retreat, a relaxing place to call home during a business trip, attending a convention, a wedding, or in need of longer-term accommodations for your medical residency or stint as a professor at OSU!
We look forward to hosting you!

name: Downtown Art Pad w/Garage - Ideal for Long Stays!
description:
Stylish Downtown Art Pad in Franklinton, ideal for long stays. Our newly renovated twin single has a well equipped designer kitchen with two bedrooms, washer & dryer and one car detached garage with opener. Enjoy the company of the artwork throughout, many original pieces compliment the living areas. The Franklinton Arts District is just down Rich St. and include Restaurants like BrewDog, Landgrant Brewing, Yellow Brick Pizza, Galleries and More. Easy access to Downtown Columbus and freeways.

The space
Enjoy the open living floor plan with gallery inspiration and some original works of art throughout this town home. Our designer kitchen is well equipped with cookware, toaster oven, blender, coffee maker, and plenty of glass ware for your different beverage needs. The art includes dining in our original Herman Miller chairs (Please be careful with them, they have lasted a long time - very comfy:) The kitchen has stainless steel appliances, granite counters, dini
neighborhood_overview: Franklinton is the new up and coming area in Columbus. Our town house property backs to Mount Carmel's College of Nursing residence. To the right of the property is open green space also owned and maintained by Mount Carmel. Next to Mount Carmel is going a $100 million residential and retail development. There are new homes being built in Franklinton and many properties are in the transitional and rehab process including the one across the street which should be done this summer. The Franklinton Arts District is just down Rich St. a half mile and include Restaurants like BrewDog, Landgrant Brewing, Yellow Brick Pizza, Galleries and More. Easy access to Downtown Columbus, OSU, and freeways.
host_about: Scott & Amy Welcome you to Columbus. We have been residents in the Columbus area for more than 25 years and both attended The Ohio State University. Scott is a Residential Realtor in Columbus.  We have worked at planning and decorating our twin single and hope our guests experience the best!

name: Quiet, Relaxing, Private bedroom/shared bath
description:
Clean and quiet stay in Dublin, OH. We are about 25-30 minutes from the local hospitals, about 30 minutes from downtown, and about 5-10 minutes to the 270 outer belt. There is ample street parking, and a garage space is available in our 2-car garage. We have high speed wi-fi, a washer and dryer, a kitchen with all the essential pans and tools. It's close to pretty much any store or restaurant. We are looking to host for longer stays, possibly traveling healthcare professionals.

The space
The bedroom has a single bed and pillows. We will provide a Smart TV with access to Netflix, Hulu, Amazon Prime Video, and Disney+. We have blackout curtains and a fan for white noise available if you work nights, but generally the house is quiet during the day. There is a closet for storage with hangers. There is a space heater if the room is too cold. The shared bathroom has a shower and tub combo with a large sink. The front door has a keypad deadbolt, and we will give you a c
neighborhood_overview: This is a very quiet neighborhood. There is a playground nearby. There's a Costco within 10 minutes, a Giant Eagle 5 minutes by car, and pretty much everything that Dublin and Hilliard have to offer within 15 minutes. New to Dublin is North Market Bridge Park, which has lots of vendors under one roof. There is also North High Brewing in Historic Dublin, with a Starbucks, Jenni's Ice Cream, and my favorite, Condado's Tacos.
