name: Historic WB Factory Loft -Short North/Free Parking
description:
The Wonderbread Short North Loft is a newly remodeled industrial loft in the former Wonderbread factory in Italian village. The home is the perfect getaway for a weekend with friends or a relaxing space for a business traveler.

Guets are treated to a true loft with 20ft ceilings, original brick floors + walls!

This is truly a unique Airbnb experience and a rare find!!!

The space
This is a true renovated industrial loft apartment with 20ft + ceilings and HUGE widows to allow plenty of light. All windows have roller shades as well for privacy when needed.

Guests are treated to a slice of history while enjoying first class amenities. The home features tasteful decor, exposed brick walls, polished concrete floors, stainless steel appliances, & granite counters, all the while providing all the amenities for an easy & enjoyable trip, including: hi speed WI-Fi, smart T.V with cable, towels + linens, shampoo + conditioner, coffee/tea.
neighborhood_overview: The Short North is the most vibrant neighborhood in Columbus. This home is located in Italian Village which gives you the peace and quiet you want while sleeping, with quick access to high street or surrounding areas that cater the best nightlife, restaurants and shopping that Columbus has to offer.

Redeveloped in 2019, the space features exposed brick walls, new appliances, white granite counters, with common areas featuring original timber beams from the historic factory!

Add in the prime location with a short walk to Seventh Son Brewery, Fox in the Snow cafe, Short North, and the flat will make for the perfect trip, whether it be for work or play!

The space is a 1 BR / 1 BA flat in the old Columbus candy & EJ Thomas factory.

name: Charming Clintonville Guest Suite
description:
No reviews yet? No need to worry! This is the newest listing from a team of experienced hosts, who have completed more than 1000 great stays in Columbus. Click on our picture below to see the reviews on our other listings.

Be our guest at this charming Clintonville guest suite (private space inside a larger home) located on a quiet street in a safe neighborhood - and just a 4-minute walk from the fabulous Northstar Cafe on High Street!

The space
This is a fully private guest suite inside of a single family home. It has its own dedicated entrance and private bathroom. You will not have access to the kitchen (just the minifridge and microwave shown in the basement).

There are long-term tenants living in the other part of the home, but they have their own entrance and you will not need to interact with them or have any shared spaces.

You will park on the street and enter through the front door into the front room where the beds are
neighborhood_overview:
Not kidding here: Clintonville was recently named the "Nicest Place in Ohio" by Reader's Digest. Here's a short excerpt from the article:

The Clintonville neighborhood in Columbus, Ohio is an older area of the city filled with a wealth of houses built in the early 1900’s, stately old trees, parks, shops, restaurants and possibly the highest density of Toyota Priuses per capita of anywhere you’ll find. The sense of community is really impressive here and our neighborhood recently gained national attention when two young aspiring musicians put on a porch recital for their 78 year old neighbor Helena Schlam while she was sheltering in place at home.
host_about:
Hi, we're Kate and Nat!  We live here in the "Short North" neighborhood of Columbus, near the properties that we manage.

We are both graduates of The Ohio State University - Go Bucks!  Kate is a physical therapist and Nat has a background in IT & management consulting.  We love being Airbnb hosts and hearing about all the exciting reasons that people travel to Columbus!

neighborhood_overview:
ABOUT GERMAN VILLAGE

You are in one of the best parts of Columbus, Ohio—beautiful and historic German Village. There is so much to see and do and most of the area is pedestrian friendly.

We have our favorite eateries including Barcelona, Sycamore Café, Brown Bag Deli, Winans, Pistachio Vera, The Kitchen, Lindey’s, Katzinger’s, G Michaels, Skillet, Village Coney, Schmidt's, Thurmans, Fox in the Snow, Antiques on High (brewery), Alpine, Smoked on High BBQ….. Check out German Village Society for details.

For fitness options, there is a Snap Fitness facility on Third Ave and Schiller Rec Center in the Park (both are fee-based).

Bike and scooter rentals are nearby.

name: Private House in Old North/SOHUD, No Cleaning Fee
description:
Private house, half of a duplex. Just steps away from OSU and south of Clintonville. This private house has three bedrooms and sleeps up to 6 people.

This house is usually part of The Wayfaring Buckeye Hostel. However, in a effort to accommodate the preferences of travelers right now, we have subdivided the Hostel back into its two original houses (duplex). This rental consists of one entire half of the duplex (private house) for you. You will have your own entrance.

The space
Included items:
-Linens: towel, sheets, and bedding (we do not allow guest to bring their own bedding)
-Free Wi-Fi
-Computer
-Large living/dining room
-Large projector screen (with streaming)
-coffee or tea (self-serve)
-6-person outdoor hot tub (shared with the other half of the duplex)
-Private Kitchen (to cook or store your own groceries)
-Free use of the laundry machines
-Reading lights over each bed
-Limited
host_about: I'm an outgoing type who values the experience of travel.  Airbnb helps me to afford to travel more.  I love meeting new people.  I actually grew up in a Bed & Breakfast so hosting seems to come very naturally to me.

name: Unfurnished 2 bedroom 1 bathroom home Grandview
description:
This rental will NOT be furnished. The furniture pictured is that of current tenants. This property is available for only long term leases (minimum of 3 months) and guests are required to have their own furniture. This is a 1500 square foot 2 bedroom 1 bathroom apartment. It features 2 gorgeous living rooms and private side yard. You are just minutes away from Downtown Columbus, COSI, Nationwide Arena, The Schottenstein, the Arena District and the ‘Shoe. Everything you could want is close by!

The space
This Airbnb rental will include the first floor of a duplex. This rental has 2 bedrooms, 2 living rooms, and one bathroom. The adorable private patio and side yard is perfect for enjoying the sunshine. Just one block away is Grandview Ave. This RENTAL DOES NOT INCLUDE ANY FURNITURE.
